CHAPTER.VERS: Abraham’ suan David, David’ suan Jesuh Khrih’ khang ciaptehna hih bang ahi hi.
Abraham ta Isaac, Isaac ta Jakob, Jakob ta Judah le a sanggamte ahi uh hi.
Judah ta Perez le Zerah hi a, Tamar tawh a neih a ta ahi uh hi. Perez ta Hezron, Hezron ta Ram,
Ram ta Amminadab, Amminadab ta Nahshon, Nahshon ta Salmon,
Salmon ta Boaz, Rahab tawh a neih a ta ahi hi. Boaz ta Obed, Ruth tawh a neih a ta ahi hi. Obed ta Jessi,
Jessi ta kumpi David ahi hi.David ta Solomon, Uriah’ zi Bathsheba tawh a neih pen ahi hi.
Solomon ta Rehoboam, Rehoboam ta Abijah, Abijah ta Asa,
Asa ta Jehoshafat, Jehoshafat ta Joram, Joram ta Uzziah,
Uzziah ta Jotham, Jotham ta Ahaz, Ahaz ta Hezekiah,
Hezekiah ta Manasseh, Manasseh ta Amon, Amon ta Josiah,
Josiah ta Jekhoniah le a sanggamte hi a, Babylon gamah Israel mite salin a kipaipih hun pawlin a suak ahi uh hi.
Jekhoniah ta Shealtiel, Shealtiel ta Zerubbabel,
Zerubbabel ta Abiud, Abiud ta Eliakim, Eliakim ta Azor,
Azor ta Zadok, Zadok ta Akhim, Akhim ta Eliud,
Eliud ta Eleazer, Eleazer ta Matthan, Matthan ta Jakob,
Jakob ta Josef hi a, Josef pen Khrih a kici Jesuh’ nu Mary’ pasal ahi hi.

Hih bang ahih manin Abraham panin David ciang dong khang sawm le li pha a, David panin Babylon gamah salin a kipaikhiatpih dong khang sawm le li mah pha a, Babylon gamah salin a kipaikhiatpih a kipanin Khrih a suah hun ciang dong khang sawm le li mah a pha hi.
Jesuh Khrih a hong suahna zia hih bang ahi hi. Mary pen Josef adingin zuthawl piaksa hi a, ahi zongin a kiteen taktak ma-un Kha Siangtho in amah a gaisakna thu Mary in a thei hi.
A lawmpa Josef pen a manin a gamta nuam mi khat ahih manin a lawmnu maizumsak nuam lo a, kuama theih lohin maksim dingin a ngaihsun hi.

Ahi zongin hih bangin thu a ngaihsut laitakin a mang sungah Topa’ vantungmi khat hong kilang a, “David suan Josef aw, Mary sunga nau pen Kha Siangtho in a gaisak ahih manin amah teenpih ngamlah kei in.
Amah in tapa khat hong nei dinga, tua tapa in ama mite a mawhna uh panin hon khia ding ahih manin ama min dingin Jesuh na phuak ding hi,” ci-in thu a gen hi.
Topa in kamsangpa tungtawnin a gensa thu a tun theih nadingin hih thute a piang ahi hi. Tua a genna-ah,
“Nungak khat gai-intapa khat nei dinga,ama min dinginEmmanuel kiphuak ding hi,”ci hi. Emmanuel a khiatna in, eite tawh Pasian hong omkhawm hi, a cihna ahi hi.
Josef zong a khanlawh ciangin Topa’ vantungmi’ sawl bangin a zi a la hi.
Ahi zongin tua tapa a suah hun dongin a zi luppih lo a, a suah ciangin a min dingin Jesuh a phuak hi.
Herod in Judea gamah kumpi a sep hun laitakin tua gam sung Bethlehem khua-ah Jesuh a suak hi. A suah khit phetin aksi thu lamsang a siam mi pawlkhat, nisuahna lam panin Jerusalem-ah hong tung uh a,
“Jew mite’ kumpi ding ahi naungek a hong suak pen koi lai-ah om ahi hiam? Nisuahna lam pan ama aksi hong suah ciangin ka mu uh a, amah a bia dingin a hong pai ka hi uh hi,” hong ci uh hi.
Kumpi Herod in hih thu a zak ciangin lamdangsa mahmah a, Jerusalem khuami khempeuh in zong lamdang a sa ciat uh hi.
Tua ahih manin Herod in siampi liante le Thukham hilh siate khempeuh kaikhawm a, “Koi lai-ah Khrih suak ding ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.

Amaute in, “Kamsangpa in a lai gelhna sungah,‘Judah gamah a omBethlehem khua aw,ka mi Israel-te a uk dinginnangma sung panin ukpa khathong piang ding ahih maninJudah gam a uk khuate lakaha neu na hi het kei hi,’ci ahih manin Judea gam sung Bethlehem khua-ah suak ding hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Tua ciangin Herod in tua mipilte samsim a, aksi a kilat hun teltakin a dot khit ciangin,

Bethlehem khua-ah a pai nadingun sawl a, “Tua naungek limtakin va zong unla, kei zong hong pai-in amah ka biak theih nadingin na muh khit uh ciangin kei kiangah thu hong zasak un,” ci-in a vaikhak hi.

Amaute in kumpipa’ vaikhak thuteng a zak khit uh ciangin pai khia uh a, nisuahna lamah a muh uh aksi mah, lam a pai laitakun mu uh a, naungek omna tung santak a tun matengin amaute mai-ah tua aksi na pai hi.
Tua aksi a muh uh ciangin a lungdamna uh kigen thei lo hi.

Inn sungah amaute lut uh a, naungek le a nu Mary a mu uh hi. Amaute khukdinin tua naungek a biak khit uh ciangin a vanpuakte uh suah khia uh a, kham, saledi paknamtui le myrrh paknamtuite, letsongin a pia uh hi.
Herod kiangah a kihilkik loh nadingun a mang sung uhah Pasian in hilh ahih manin, lampi dang tawnin a gam uhah a ciahkik uh hi.

Tua mipilte a ciah khit uh ciangin Josef’ mang sungah Topa’ vantungmi khat hong kilang a, “Kithawi-in naungek le a nu, Egypt gamah taipih in. Pai khia un, ci-in kong genkik matengin tua gamah va om un. Herod in naungek thah dingin hong zong ding hi,” a ci hi.
Josef zong kithawi pah a, Egypt gam a zuan dingin naungek le a nu tawh zanpi mahin ding khia uh a,
Herod a sih hun ciang dong tua gamah a va om uh hi. Kamsangpa tungtawnin Topa in, “Egypt gam panin ka Tapa ka sam khia hi,” ci-in a genna thu a tun nadingin hih bangin a piang ahi hi.

Nisuahna lam panin a hong pai mipilte in amah a khem lamtak Herod in a theih ciangin a heh suak mahmah hi. Tua mipilte tung panin aksi a kilat hun a dotna tawh kizui-in, Bethlehem khua le a kiima om naungek kum nih ciang le a nuaisiah khempeuh a that dingin a galkapte a sawl hi.
Hih bangin thu hong pian ciangin kamsangpa Jeremiah in,
“Nakpi taka kahna awgingRamah gam sungah kiza hi.Rachel in a tate kah a,a tate khempeuhsi khin ahih manina kah a tawp nadinginkikhem zo lo hi,”ci-in a genna thu a tun nading ahi hi.
Herod a sih khit ciangin Egypt gam a om Josef kiangah Topa’ vantungmi khat hong kilang a,
“Naupang a that nuam mite si khinta ahih ciangin kithawi inla, naupang le a nu tawh Israel gamah ciah un,” a ci hi.
Josef zong kithawi-in, naupang le a nu tawh Israel gamah a ciah uh hi.
Ahi zongin Arkhelaus in a pa Herod’ za laihin Judea gam uk mahin a omna thu a zak ciangin tua gamah Josef ciah ngam lo hi. Tua ahih manin a mang sung mahah a kihilna bangin Galilee gam sungah lutin,
Nazareth khua-ah a teeng uh hi. Kamsangte in, “Amah pen Nazareth khuami kici ding hi,” ci-in a gen kholhna a tun nadingin hih bangin a piang ahi hi.
Tua hun laitakin tuiphumpa Johan hong pai-in, Judea gam sungah thuhilh hong kipan a,
“Vantung ki-ukna hun hong naita ahih manin na mawhnate uh kisikkik un,” a ci hi.
Kamsang Isaiah in,“Gam sungah mi khat kiko a,‘Topa’ pai nadinglampi bawl unla,a tot ding lampi tangsak un,’ ci hi,”ci-in a gen ciangin hih Johan’ thu a gen ahi hi.
Johan in kalaoh mul kigan puan silhin, savun kawnggak tawh a kawng gak a, kauphe le gamlak khuaizu tawh a kivak hi.
Jerusalem khua, Judea gam sung le Jordan Gun kiim gam panin mite hong pai uh hi.
Amaute in a mawhnate uh hong pulak uh a, Johan in Jordan Gun sungah amaute a tuiphum hi.

Ahi zongin Farisi mite le Saddusi mite tampi tak tui a kiphum dingin a hong pai a muh ciangin Johan in amaute kiangah, “Gul bangin ngian a zang note aw, a hong tung ding Pasian’ hehna panin na suahtak theih nading uh kua in hong hilh khol ahi hiam?
Na kisikkikna uh a kilangsak ding gamtatna gamta unla,
‘Abraham’ suante ihi ngawn hi,’ cihna lungsim nei mawk kei un. Ke’n kong cih in-ah, Pasian in hih suangte nangawn Abraham’ suanlekhakte-in a bawl thei hi lel hi.
Tu mahmahin sing a bulphuk dingin hei tawh kingim zo hi. Tua ahih manin gah hoih a gah lo sing khempeuh kiphukin meikhuk sungah kikhul ding hi.

Na kisikkik khitna uh a kilat nadingin tui sungah note ka hong phum a, ahi zongin kei nungah a hong pai pa in Kha Siangtho le mei sungah note hong phum ding hi. Tua a hong pai ding pa pen kei sangin nakpitakin lian zaw a, ama khedap a tawisak ding nangawnin ka kilawm zo nai kei hi.
Amah in a khutah anzapna tawi-in a ante zap a, a taksate khawmin a ansal sungah koih dinga, a ansite ahihleh a mit ngei lo mei sungah a khul ding hi,” ci-in thu a hilh hi.
Tua laitakin Galilee gam panin Jesuh hong pai a, Johan’ khut sungah a kituiphum dingin ama omna Jordan Gun-ah a hong tung hi.
Ahi zongin Johan in na tuiphum nuam lo a, “Nang in kei nong tuiphum dingin a kilawm zaw kimlai, kei’ phum dingin nang hong pai zawsop na hi hiam?” a na ci hi.
Ahi zongin Jesuh in, “Pasian in hih dingin kisam a sak khempeuh i hih ding a kilawm thu ahih manin tu-in hong phum hoh in,” a cih ciangin Johan in zong a mang hi.
Jesuh a kituiphum khit phetin tui sung panin a pai khia pah hi. Tua laitakin vantung hong kihong a, vakhu bangin Pasian’ Kha Siangtho hong kumsukin ama tungah a khawl a mu hi.
Tua sung mahin vantung panin aw khat hong ging a, “Hih pen ka it mahmah ka Tapa hi a, ama tungah ka lungkim mahmah hi,” a hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin Dawimangpa’ ze-etna a thuak dingin Kha Siangtho in gamlakah Jesuh a paipih hi.
Jesuh in sun sawmli le zan sawmli sung an ne loin omkhin ahih manin a gil a kial hi.
Tua ciangin ama kiangah Dawimangpa hong pai a, “Pasian’ Tapa na hih takpi leh hih suangte anlum a suah nadingin thu pia in,” a ci hi.
Ahi zongin Jesuh in, “Lai Siangtho sungah,‘Anlum bek tawhmite nungta lo a,Pasian genkhiat thute tawhnungta zaw hi,’ci-in kigelh hi lo ahi hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin Dawimangpa in gamlak panin Jerusalem khua-ah Jesuh paipih a, biakinn khumzang a sang pen munah a kahtohpih khit ciangin,

“Pasian’ Tapa taktak na hih leh Lai Siangtho sungah,‘Pasian innang a hong kem dingina vantung mitehong sawl ding hi.Na khete le suanga kitahkhak loh nadinginvantung mite in a khut uh tawhnang hong dom ding hi,’ci-in kigelh ahih manin, hih lai panin tuaksuk in,” a ci hi.
Jesuh in, “Lai Siangtho mahah, ‘Na Topa Pasian na ze-et kei in,’ ci-in gen hi lo ahi hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin Dawimangpa in mual sang mahmah khatah Jesuh paipihto a, leitung kumpi gam khempeuh le a hoihna teng a lah khit ciangin,
“Ka mai-ah kunin kei hong bia lecin hihte khempeuh nangma tungah kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Jesuh in, “Satan aw, tai khia in. Lai Siangtho in, ‘Na Topa Pasian bek bia inla, ama na bek sem in,’ ci hi lo ahi hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin Dawimangpa pai khia a, vantung mite hong pai-in Jesuh huhin an a vak uh hi.
Jesuh in Johan a kimatna thu a zak ciangin Galilee gam sungah va kihem hi.
Galilee gam Nazareth khua-ah omsuak loin pai khia leuleu a, Zebulun le Naftali gam sung Galilee Tuili gei-a om Kapernaum khua-ah a va teeng hi.
Tua bangin a va tenna pen kamsangpa Isaiah thugen a tun nading ahi hi. Tua a genna-ah,
“Gentail mite’ tennaGalilee gam sung,Jordan Gun galkhat,Tuipi lampangah a omZebulun le Naftali gam!
Khuamial sunga a teeng mite inkhuavak lianpi mu ding uh hi.Sihna gam khuamial sungaha teeng mite tungahkhuavak hong taang ding hi,”ci hi.
Tua hun a kipan Jesuh in thuhilh ding kipan a, “Vantung ki-ukna hong naita ahih manin kisikin na omzia uh kheel un,” ci-in thu a hilh hi.
Galilee Tuili gei-ah Jesuh a pai laitakin ngabeng Peter a kici Simon le a nau Andru, ngen tawh nga khuhin a om a mu hi.
Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Kei hong zui un; nga mat bangin pawl tampi a ngah thei mi kong suaksak ding hi,” ci hi.
Amau tegel in zong a ngente uh nusia-in Jesuh a zui pah uh hi.
Tua lai panin a pai khiat khit uh ciangin Zebedi tapa James le Johan-te unau, a pa uh tawh gunkuang sungah ngen puahin a om mu leuleu a, amau tegel zong a sam hi.
Amau tegel in zong gunkuang le a pa uh nusia-in Jesuh a zui pah uh hi.
Galilee gam sung khempeuh ah Jesuh pai kawikawi a, amau’ kikhopna innte-ah thu hilhin, vantung ki-ukna hangin lungdamna thute hilh a, natna tuamtuam a nei cina khempeuh a damsak hi.

Syria gam sung khempeuh ah ama thu kizel ahih manin dawivei mi, sibup mi, khutzaw khezaw mi a kipanin natna satna a tuamtuam a nei mi khempeuh ama kiangah hong kipuak a, amah in a vekpi-in a damsak hi.
Galilee gam, Khuapi Sawmte gam, Jerusalem khua, Judea gam le Jordan Gun galkhat gam panin mi tampi tak in Jesuh a zui uh hi.
Jesuh in tua bangin mihon tampi tak a muh ciangin mual tung lamah kahto-in tusuk a, a nungzuite zong ama nai-ah hong tu uh hi.
Tua ciangin a kam ka-in amaute tungah thu hilh ding kipan a,
“Kha thu lamahzawngkhal a kisate sungahvantung ki-ukna thuom ahih maninthupha ngah mi ahi uh hi.
Dahin a thum a tau mitePasian in amautehehnem ding ahih maninthupha ngah mi ahi uh hi.
A lungnem mite inPasian’ ciamsa leitangngah ding uh ahih maninthupha ngah mi ahi uh hi.
Pasian’ deih tengsep ding a hanciamtePasian in lungkimnangahsak ding ahih maninthupha ngah mi ahi uh hi.
Midang a hehpih mite tungahPasian in hehpihnapia ding ahih maninthupha ngah mi ahi uh hi.
Lungsim takpi tawhPasian a zong mite inPasian mu ding ahih maninthupha ngah mi ahi uh hi.
Kilem nading deihina hanciam mite inPasian’ tate cihnangah ding uh ahih maninthupha ngah mi ahi uh hi.
Pasian’ deihna bangina gamtat maninbawlsiatna a thuak mitevantung ki-ukna sungaha omte ahih maninthupha ngah mi ahi uh hi.
“Midangte in keima hangin a man lopi-in hong simmawhin hong bawlsia a, a nam tuamtuamin hong gensiat uh ciangin thupha ngah mi na hi uh hi.
Note adingin vantungah thaman lianpi hong kikoih kholhsak ahih manin tua bang na tuah uh ciangin nuamin na lungdam un. Note’ hun ma-a kamsangte zong tua bangmahin a na kibawlsia ngei ahi hi.

“Note pen leitung mite adingin ci tawh na kibang uh hi. Ahi zongin ci a alna bei leh i alsakkik theih nading lampi om nawn lo hi. A kizat nading bangmah om nawn lo a, mite’ tuatcil gawp dingin kipaai lel hi.
“Note pen leitung mite adingin khuavak tawh na kibang uh hi. Mual dawnah a om khua kiseelcip thei lo hi.
Mei a vak khit ciangin kuamah in lawh khuh lo hi. Meivakna mun sangah koih zaw a, inn sung khempeuh a taangsak hi.
Midangte in na gamtatna hoihte uh a muh ciangin vantungah a om na Pa uh min a phat theih nadingun mite mai-ah na gamtat hoihna uh khuavak bangin na kilangsak un.
“Moses Thukham le kamsangte’ thuhilhnate a phiat dingin hong pai hi, ci-in hong ngaihsun kei un. Tuate a phiat dingin a hong pai hi loin, amaute’ hilhna a kicingsak dingin a hong pai ka hizaw hi.
Hoihtakin na phawk ding uh thu panin: Van le lei a bei mateng, hih thukhamte a neu pen khat nangawn’ deihna tangtung lopi-in mawkmai lo ding hi.

Tua ahih manin hih thukhamte lakpan a neu pente khat bek nangawn zuikha loin, midangte in zong a zuih loh nadingin a gen mite pen vantung ki-ukna sungah mi neu pen hi ding uh hi. Ahi zongin hih thukhamte zui-in, midangte in zong a zuih nadingin a hilh mite pen vantung ki-ukna sungah milian hi ding uh hi.
Tua ahih manin Pasian’ deihna bangin gamtat nading thu-ah Thukham hilh siate le Farisi mite sangin na cihtak zawk uhleh vantung ki-ukna sungah a om thei bek ding na hi uh hi.
“Tanglai mite tungah, ‘Mi that kei un. Mi that peuhmah in sihna thuak ding hi,’ ci-in a kigenna thu na zaksa uh ahi hi.

Ahi zongin ke’n note kiangah kong genin-ah: A sanggampa tungah a heh mi in thukhenna thuakkha thei ding hi. A sanggampa kiangah, ‘Bangmah a kimang lo,’ ci-in a ko bawl mi in uliante mai-ah thusitna thuak thei dinga, a sanggampa kiangah, ‘Mihai,’ ci-in a simmawh mi in hell meikuang sungah khulna thuak thei ding hi.
Tua ahih manin Pasian tungah biakna a pia dingin biakna tau mai-ah na om laitakin na sanggamte khat peuhpeuh na tungah a lungkim lohna thu na phawk leh,
Pasian na biak nading nate, a biakna tau mai-ah nusia photin, pai-in na sanggampa tawh va kilem phot inla, tua khit ciangin hong paikikin Pasian biakna pia in.

Nangma tungah mi khatpeuh lungkim loin zumah hong khiat leh, zum na tun ma-un hun om lai-in na kilem pak nadingin hanciam in. Tua hikeileh zum na tun uh ciangin thukhente khut sung na tung dinga, thukhente in palikte khut sungah hong apin, palikte in thong sungah hong khum ding hi.
A mantakin kong genin-ah: Na liau sum na piak khit dong matengin thong sung panin na suakta ngei kei ding hi.
“‘Mi zi tungah na mawh kei ding hi,’ ci-in a kigenna thu na zaksa uh ahi hi.
Ahi zongin ke’n kong genin-ah: Mawhpih nopna lungsim tawh numei khat a en mi peuhmah in a lungsimah tua numei tawh a mawh ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin na mit taklam in na mawh nading hong piansak leh khel khia inla paai in. Na pumpi bupin hell khuk sungah hong kikhul sangin na pumpi na khat pelem leh nang adingin hoih zaw lai hi.
Na taklam khut in na mawh nading hong piansak leh sattan inla paai in. Na pumpi bupin hell khuk sungah hong kikhul sangin na pumpi na khat pelem leh nang adingin hoih zaw lai hi.
“‘A zi a ma mi peuhmah in a zi tungah makna lai pia tahen,’ ci-in a kigenna zong na zak khitsa uh ahi hi.

Ahi zongin ke’n note kiangah kong genin-ah: Mi khat peuhmah in pasal dang tawh a mawhna hang lobuang, a zi a mak peuhmah a, a zi in pasal a neihkik leh mi tawh a mawh dingin a bawl a suak hi. Tua a kima numei a tenpihte, numei tawh a mawh mah ahi hi.
“Tanglai-in mite tungah, ‘Pasian tungah na kiciamnate uh pelh kei unla, ama tungah na kiciam bangun tungsak un,’ ci-in a kigenna na zaksa uh ahi hi.
Ahi zongin ke’n note kiangah kong genin-ah: Hih ding khat peuhpeuh na neih uh ciangin kiciamna na zang vet kei un. Kiciamna-in vantung na zang kei un - Pasian’ tokhom hi veve hi.
Leitung zong kiciamna-in na zang kei un - Pasian’ khengakna mah hi veve hi. Jerusalem khuapi zong kiciamna-in na zang kei un - Kumpi lian ahi Pasian’ khuapi mah hi veve hi.
Kiciamna-in na lutang zong na zang kei in. Na lu tunga om samzang khat bek nangawn a kangsa vomsak thei loin, a vom pen na kangsak thei kei hi.

Na gen peuhmah ahi ahihleh, ‘Hi,’ ci inla, ahi lo ahihleh, ‘Hilo,’ cihna tawh kicingsak in. Tua bang hi loin kiciamna kam na zat ciangin Dawimangpa tawh kizomin thuman lo na hih lamtak hong kilang hi.
“Note in, ‘Mittang khat tang ding mittang khat, ha khat tang ding ha khat,’ ci-in a kigenna na zaksa uh ahi hi.
Ahi zongin note kiangah ke’n kong genin-ah: A gilote na thukkik kei un. Mi khatpeuh in na paang taklam hong bet leh a langkhat zong na dawh lai zaw in.
Mi khatpeuh in na puansungsilh a ngahnop manin zumah hong khia-in hong laksak leh na puantungsilh zong na piathuah lai in.
Galkapte khatpeuh in tai khat sung a van pua dingin hong sawl leh a valin tai khat sung mah na puaksak lai in.
Mi khat peuhpeuh in na khat peuhpeuh hong nget leh na pia inla, nang kiang panin na a hong leitawi mite na pia in.
“Note in, ‘Na veengte uh na it unla, na galte uh na mudah un,’ ci-in a kigenna thu na zaksa uh ahi hi.
Ahi zongin ke’n note kiangah kong genin-ah: Na galte uh na it unla, no hong bawlsiate adingin thu na ngetsak un.

Tua hileh vantungah a om na Pa uh tate na hi thei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in mihoihte le misiate tungah a kibangin ni taangsak khawm a, a gamtat phate le a gamtat siate tungah zong a kibang mahin guah zusak khawm hi.
Tua ahih manin no hong itte bek na it uhleh Pasian in bang thaman hong pia zenzen ding ahi hiam? Siahdongte nangawn in amau a itte it thei uh hi.
Na lawmte bek uh hopihin thupha na piak uhleh mi mawkmawkte sangin na hoihzawkna uh bang om ahi hiam? Gentail mite nangawn in tua bang ciang lel hih thei uh hi.
Tua ahih manin vantungah a om na Pa uh a cingtaak mah bangin note zong lungsim citakin na cingtaak nading uh na hanciam un.

“Biakna tawh kizomin na hoih khat peuhpeuh na sep uh ciangin mite’ phat ding deihna tawh a kilang theithei dingin na sepkhak loh nadingun na kingaihsun un. Tua bangin gamta le-uhcin, vantungah a om na Pa uh kiang panin thaman na ngah kei ding uh hi.

“Tua ahih manin mi cimawhte tungah huhna na piak uh ciangin, mite in a phat ding uh a deihna tawh a kineihkhem mite in kikhopna inn sung le kongzing lakah a kilang theithei-in a hih uh bangin na hih kei un. Tua bangin a hih mite in thaman a ngah khinta ahihna thu limtakin na phawk un.
Ahi zongin note in mi cimawhte citna tawh na huh uh ciangin na lawm naihuai pente uh nangawn in hong theih loh nadingun pia unla,
kuamah theisak kei un. Tua hileh kuama muh lohin na gamtatna uh a mu na Pa un note tungah thaman hong pia ding hi.

“Note in thu na nget uh ciangin mite’ muh theih dingin a kineihkhem mite in kikhopna inn sung le kongzing lamka lai-ah a ngetnop se uh bangin na gamta kei un. Tua bangin a gamtate in thaman a ngah khinta ahihna uh limtakin phawk un.

Ahi zongin thu na nget uh ciangin na inn sung uhah tumin kong khak unla, na muh theih loh uh na Pa uh kiangah na ngen un. Tua hileh kuama muh lohin na gamtatna uh a hong mu na Pa un note’ tungah thaman hong pia ding hi.
“Thu na nget uh ciangin i thunget sau leh Pasian in hong pia deuh ding hi, ci-in a ngaihsun Gentail mite bangin khiatna a nei tum lo kam tampi na luilui kei un.
Tua na thunget ma nangawnun na Pa un note’ kisapna teng hong theikhin ahih manin Gentail mite na bang kei un.
Tua ahih manin thu na nget uh ciangin hih bangin na ngen un:‘Vantunga om kote’ Pa aw,na min siangthokizahtak hen.
Na ukna hun hong tung henla,vantung banginleitungah zongna deih bangin kigamta hen.
Nisim khamkhopan hong pia in.
Kote tungah a hong mawhtemawh maisaknaka neih bangunko’ mawhna zonghong maisak in.
Ze-etna lianhong thuaksak ke’n.Gilo’ kiang panhong hon khia in,’(Uk zawhna, vangliatna,minthanna,na nei tawntung hi. Amen.)ci-in na ngen ding uh hi.
Note in midangte’ hong mawhna na maisak uhleh vantungah a om na Pa un zong note’ mawhna hong maisak ding hi.
Ahi zongin note in midangte’ hong mawhna na maisak kei uhleh vantungah a om na Pa un zong note’ mawhna hong maisak lo ding hi.

“An na tan uh ciangin a kineihkhem mite bangin maikhingin om kei un. Amaute in an a tanlam uh mite in a theih ding uh a ut manun gilkial mai pua-in a om uh hi. Amaute in a antan thaman uh a ngah khinta ahih lamtak limtakin thei un.
Ahi zongin an na tan uh ciangin na mai uh phiatin na sam uh hiat un.
Tua hileh midangte in na an tanlam uh a theih loh hangin na muh theih loh na Pa un hong thei veve dinga, kuama theih lohin na tanlam uh a hong thei na Pa un note’ tungah thaman hong pia ding hi.
“Nget in ne-in a kekseu theihna, gutate in luhin a guktheihna hih leitungah na sum uh khol kei un.
Nget in a nek theih lohna, a kekseu theih lohna, gutate in luhin a guk theih lohna mun vantungah note adingin khol zaw un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh na sum omna uhah na lungsim uh om tawntung ding hi.
“Mittang pen pumpi adingin meivak tawh kibang hi. Na mit uh ciim leh na pumpi un hoihtakin khua mu thei hi.
Ahi zongin na mit uh maang leh na pumpi uh adingin khua a mial hi. Tua ahih manin note’ sunga a om khuavak pen a mial hileh tua mialna pen nasia mahmah ding hi.
“Kuamah, to nih’ sila hikhawm thei lo hi. Khat mudahin khat it dinga, khat tungah thumanin khat simmawhbawl ding hi. Note in Pasian’ na le leitung sum na na semkhawm zo kei ding uh hi.

“Tua ahih ciangin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Na nuntak nadingun bang ne-in bang dawn ding cih ahi a, na pumpi uh adingin bang silh ding cih ahi zongin lunghimawh lua kei un. Nuntakna pen an sangin thupi zaw a, pumpi pen puan sangin thupi zaw hi lo ahi hiam?

“Vanah a leeng vasate ngaihsun dih un: Amaute in khai tuh lo, an zong la lo, sal sungah zong khol lo napi-in vantungah a om na Pa un tuate a nek ding uh tasamsak lo hi. Tua vasate sangin note manpha zaw thampek hi lo na hi uh hiam?
Na lunghihmawh manun kua in na khan uh kum bangzah sotto thei na hi uh hiam?
Bang hangin puansilh ding lunghimawh na hi uh hiam? Gamlak a om paakte a nuntakzia ngaihsun dih un: Amaute in amau adingin na lah sem lo, khau zong kheek lo napi-in,
a hau mahmah Solomon nangawn a hoih penin a kizep ciangin zong hih paakte ban zo nai lo lai hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tuni-in hingin, a zing ciang mahin meikhukah a kikhultum lel hih gamlak lopate Pasian in puansilh guan ahihleh note hong lim guat zaw ding ahih manin na upna uh a neu mahmah ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin bang ne dinga, bang dawn dinga, bang silh ding ihi hiam, ci-in lunghimawh lua kei un.
(Gentail mite in lunghihmawh penin a neihte uh hih bangte ahi hi.) Hih nate khempeuh na kisap lamtak uh vantungah a om na Pa un a thei hi.
Thudang khempeuh sangin Pasian’ ukna le ama deihna na zuih theih nading uh thupi ngaihsut masa zaw un. Tua hileh hih na kisapna dangte khempeuh uh zong hong piathuah veve ding hi.
“Tua ahih manin zing ciang huna ding ma lungkham masa kei un. Zing ciang thu ding ama thu-in omsak lel un. Tuni thu pen tuni thu mah tawh beisak unla, lungkham ding behlap se kei un.
“Pasian in note hong mawhsak loh nadingin midangte va mawhsaksak nawn kei un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh midangte’ thu na khenzia uh tawh kizui-in note tungah hong khen dinga, midangte tungah na zat uh ngeina mah note tungah hong zang ding hi.
Bang hangin na lawmte’ mit sunga ninthem tang muhsak thei napi-in nangma mit sunga singluang tang phawk thei lo na hi hiam?
Nangma mit sungah singluang a tang kimlai, bangci-in na lawmte kiangah, ‘Na mit sunga ninthem tang hong lakkhiatsak ning,’ ci thei ding na hi hiam?
No a kineihkhem mite aw, note’ mit sunga singluang tang la khia masa le-uhcin, na lawmte uh mit sunga ninthem tang na lakkhiat theih nadingun hoihtakin khua na mu thei pan ding uh hi.
“Uite tungah a siangtho nate pia kei un. Pia le-uhcin hong pet zawsop ding hi. Vokte mai-ah na suangmanphate uh lot kei un. Lot le-uh cin sikcip lel ding uh hi.
“Ngen un; na nget uhleh hong kipia ding hi. Zong un; na zon uhleh na mu ding uh hi. Kongkhak na kiu un; na kiuh uhleh hong kihon ding hi.
Bang hang hiam na cih uhleh a ngente khempeuh in ngah ding uh a, a zongte khempeuh in mu ding uh a, a kiute khempeuh ading kong kihon ding hi.
Pa ahi note khatpeuh in na tate un anlum hong ngen leh suangtum pia ding na hi uh hiam?
Ngasa hong ngen leh gul pia ding na hi uh hiam?
Note mihoih lo hinapi-in na tate uh tungah na hoih piak ding ngaihsun thei na hih uhleh vantungah a om na Pa un a ngen mite tungah na hoihte hong pia zaw mahmah ding hi lo ahi hiam?
Tua ahih manin note tungah hong kibawl ding na deih bangun midangte tungah na bawl un. Moses Thukhamte le kamsangte’ thuhilhnate pen hih mah a deihna ahi hi.
“Kong kawcik bek tawnin lut un. Hell khuk tun nading kongvang pen lianin a lampi baih a, mi tampi in a zui uh hi.
Ahi zongin nuntak tawntungna tun nading kong kawcikin a lampi haksa a, mi tawmno bek in a zui zo uh hi.
“Kamsang taktak ahi lote na muh uh ciangin limtakin kikem un. Amaute in a tungthamah tuu lim hong pua-in, ahi zongin a sungtawng taktak uh ngia hangsan bang ahi uh hi.
Amaute’ gamtatna tawh amau’ pianzia na thei ding uh hi. Lingvom kung panin leenggah kilo ngei a, sialtalling kung panin theigah kilo ngei ahi hiam?
Tua ahih manin singkung cidamte in gah limci gah a, singkung ginalote in gah ginalo gah uh hi.
Singkung cidamte in gah ginalo gah ngei lo a, singkung ginalote in gah limci gah ngei lo hi.
Gah limci a gah lo singkungte kiphukin meikhuk sungah kikhul hi.
Tua ahih manin amau’ gamtatna tawh amau’ pianzia na thei ding uh hi.
“Kei kiangah, ‘Topa, Topa aw,’ hong ci mi khempeuh, vantung ki-ukna sungah lut thei kim lo ding uh a, vantungah a om ka Pa’ deihna bangin a gamta teng bek lut thei ding uh hi.

Tua ni ciangin mi tampi in kei kiangah, ‘Topa, Topa aw, nangma min tawh thu hilhin, nangma min tawh dawite hawl khia-in, nangma min tawh nalamdang lian tampi bawl hi lo ka hi uh hiam?’ hong ci ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin keimah in amaute kiangah, ‘Note ka hong thei ngei kei hi. Siatna a gamta mite aw, kei kiang panin kihem khia un,’ ka ci ding hi.
“Ka thuhilhna za-in a zui mi khempeuhte pen suang tungah a inn a lam mipil pa tawh kibang ding hi.
Guah hong zu-in, tui hong khangin, huihpi hong nung a, tua inn a nawk gawp uh hangin suang tungah kilam ahih manin kisia zo lo hi.
Hih ka thugente za napi-in a zui nuam lote pen sehnel tungah a inn a lam mihai pa tawh kibang ding hi.
Guah hong zu-in, tui hong khangin, huihpi hong nung a, tua inn a nawk gawp uh ciangin a kisia hi. Tua inn naksiat mahmah hi,” ci-in thu a gen hi.
Jesuh in hih a thugente a man khit ciangin, ama thugenna hangin mihonpite in lamdangsa mahmah uh hi.
Amah in Thukham hilh siate bangin thu gen loin, aana neite bangin thu a gen zaw hi.
Tua mual panin Jesuh hong paisuk ciangin mihon tampi in amah a zui uh hi.
Tua laitakin miphak khat hong pai-in ama mai-ah hong khukdin a, “Topa aw, nong damsaknop nakleh nong damsak thei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Jesuh in zong a khut zanin tua mipa lawng a, “Ka hong damsak nuam hi; dam ta in,” a cih khit phetin a phakna a dampah hi.

Tua ciangin Jesuh in ama kiangah, “Hih thupiang kuama kiangah gen masa loin siampipa kiangah va paisuak pahin va kivelsak inla, na damkhitna thu mi khempeuh in a theih nadingin Moses thupiakna tawh kizui-in biakna va pia in,” ci-in a vaikhak hi.
Kapernaum khua a tun ciangin Rom mi galkapbu khat ama kiangah hong pai-in,
“Topa aw, ka nasem pa cina-in inn-ah lupna ngakin om a, gim mahmahin taang zo het lo ahih manin hong damsak in,” ci-in a thum hi.
Jesuh in, “Hong pai-in ka damsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahi zongin galkap bupa in, “Topa aw, keima inn-ah nangpipi nong pai dingin kilawm lo ka hih manin a dam nadingin thu pia lel lecin zong ka nasem pa dam ding hi.

Kei zong uliante khutnuai-ah nasem mi ka hi a, keima khutnuai-ah zong galkapte a om hi. Tua galkapte khat kiangah, ‘Pai in,’ ci-in sawl leng pai a, adang khat kiangah, ‘Hong pai in,’ ci-in sam leng hong pai a, ka nasem pa kiangah, ‘Hih sem in,’ ci-in sawl leng a sem hi,” a ci hi.
Jesuh in hih bupa thugen a zak ciangin lamdangsa a, amah a zui mihonte kiangah, “A mantak a kong genin-ah Israel mite lak nangawnah hih bang upna a nei ka mu nai kei hi.
Nisuahna le nitumna panin mi tampi tak hong pai-in vantung ki-ukna sungah Abraham, Isaac le Jakob-te tawh an ne-in sabuai-ah tukhawm ding uh hi.
Ahi zongin vantung ki-ukna sungah a om dingin a kingaihsun Israel mite ahihleh pualam khuamialna-ah kilawn khia dinga, tua lai-ah kapin a hagawi ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jesuh in galkap bupa kiangah, “Na inn-ah ciah in. Na up bangin hong piang ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua hun laitak teek mahin a nasem pa a dam hi.
Peter’ inn-ah Jesuh va pai a, Peter’ sungnu nattunin lupna tungah a lum a mu hi.
Jesuh in ama khut va lawnsak hi. A natna dampah a, amah zong tho-in a zinte a do zo pah hi.
A nitak ciangin mite in Jesuh kiangah dawivei mi tampi tak hong paipih uh hi. Jesuh in kam khat pauna bek tawh dawite hawl khia-in cina khempeuh a damsak hi.
Kamsang Isaiah in, “Amah in eite’ natna teng thuakin, eite’ gimna teng pua khia hi,” ci-in a genna thu a tun nadingin hih bang a piang ahi hi.
Jesuh in ama kiangah mi tampi tak a hong omlam a theih ciangin a nungzuite kiangah, “Tuili galkhat ah pai ni,” ci-in a gen hi.
Tua laitakin Thukham hilh siate khat in ama kiangah, “Sia aw, na paina peuhpeuhah ka hong zui ding hi,” a cih leh
Jesuh in, “Ngiate in lup nading kua nei uh a, vasate in zong giah nading bu nei uh hi. Ahi zongin Mihing Tapa in a luptheih nading mun koimahah nei lo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin amah a zui midang khat in, “Topa aw, kei hong ciahsak inla, ka pa hong vuisak masa in,” a cih leh
Jesuh in, “Nangmah in kei hong zui inla, misi bang ahi mite in misite a vui dingun nusiat in,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Gunkuang tungah Jesuh a tuan ciangin a nungzuite in zong a zui uh hi.
Thakhat thu-in huihpi hong nung ahih manin tuihualte in gunkuang tum dekdek a, ahi zongin Jesuh a ihmu hi.
Nungzuite in Jesuh va phong uh a, “Topa aw, ka si dektak uh hi; hong hon in,” a va ci uh hi.
Jesuh in, “Bang hangin tuaci lau na hi uh hiam? Na upna uh neu mahmah hi,” a cih khit ciangin tho-in huihpi le tuihualte thu pia a, a dai dide pah hi.
A nungzuite in lamdangsa mahmah uh a, “Huihpi le tuihualte nangawn in ama thu mang ahih manin hih mipa a bangci mi hi ding ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Tuili galkhat, Gadara gam a tun ciangin han panin dawivei mi nih hong pai khia-in Jesuh a na dawn uh hi. Tua mi nihte kihtakhuai mahmah ahih manin amaute omna lam tawnin kuamah pai ngam lo uh hi.
Amaute nakpitakin hong kiko uh a, “Pasian’ Tapa aw, kote bang hong nuammawh na hi hiam? A hun tung nai lopi-in kote gim a pia dingin hong pai na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Tua laitakin tua san panin a gamla lo mun khatah vok honpi gamta-in a om hi.
Tua ciangin dawite in Jesuh kiangah, “Kote hong hawl khia ding na hih leh hua vokte sungah hong lutsak in,” ci-in a thum uh ciangin
Jesuh in, “Pai un,” ci ahih manin amaute zong pai khia-in vokte sungah a lut uh hi. Tua vok honte, keen luvum panin tuaksuk gawpin tuili sung tu uh ahih manin a vekpi-in tuikia-in a si khin hi.
Tua vokcingte zong tai-in khua sung tuh uh a, tua dawivei mite’ thu le a thupiang khempeuh a gen uh hi.
Tua ciangin khua sung mi khempeuh, Jesuh kiangah hong pai-in amah a muh uh ciangin, amau gam panin a pai khiat nadingin a thum uh hi.
Tua lai panin gunkuangah tuang leuleu-in tuili galkhat lama om ama khua-ah a va tungkik hi.

Mi pawlkhat in khutlekhezaw mi khat, a lupna pheek tawh hong pua-in Jesuh kiang a hong tunpih uh hi. Jesuh in amaute’ upna a muh ciangin a cina mipa kiangah, “Ka ta aw, na lungsim kinuamsak in; na mawhna hong kimaisak khinta hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Thukham hilh siate pawlkhat in a lungsim uhah, “Pasian tawh a kikim bangin kampau ahih manin hih mipa in Pasian a dem ahi hi,” ci-in a ngaihsun uh hi.
Ahi zongin Jesuh in amaute’ ngaihsutna thei ahih manin, “Bang hangin a sialamin ngaihsun na hi uh hiam?
‘Na mawhna hong kimaisak hi,’ cih ding le, ‘Tho inla pai in,’ cih ding koi baih zaw ahi hiam? Kampau lel pen baih mahmah hi.

Ahi zongin Mihing Tapa in leitungah mawhmaisak theih nading thu nei hi, ci-in na theih nadingun kong lak ding hi,” a cih khit ciangin khutlekhezaw mipa kiangah, “Tho in; na lupna pheek pua inla na inn-ah ciah in,” a ci hi.
Amah zong tho-in a inn-ah a ciahpah hi.
Mihonte in hih thu a theih uh ciangin lau mahmah uh a, Pasian in mihingte tungah hih bang vangliatna a piakna hangin ama min a phat uh hi.
Tua lai mun panin Jesuh a pai khiat ciangin siahdongpa Matthai a zumah tu-in a om mu a, “Hong zui in,” a cih leh amah zong dingin a zuipah hi.
Jesuh in Matthai’ inn-ah nitak an a nek laitakin siahdong dangte le thukham a khial midang tampite in zong Jesuh le a nungzuite tawh an a nekhawm uh hi.
Farisi mite in hih thu a muh uh ciangin Jesuh nungzuite kiangah, “Bang hangin na siapa un siahdongte le thukham khialte tawh an nekhawm ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Jesuh in hih thu a zak ciangin, “Cidamte in siavuan kisam lo uh a, cina mite bek in kisam uh hi.

Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘Ganhing tawh biak ding ka deih kei a, migitna ka deih zaw hi,’ ci-in a genna pen bang a cihnopna ahi hiam, va kan un. Mite in a zahtak mihoihte a sam dingin a hong pai ka hi kei a, mite in a pampaih mite a sam dingin a hong pai ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jesuh kiangah Tuiphumpa Johan’ nungzuite hong pai uh a, “Bang hangin kote le Farisi mite in an tang zelzel napi-in, na nungzuite in tang lo se ahi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.

Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Mopina pawi khatah, a zineipa a om sungin a mopawi simte dah dingin um na hi uh hiam? Dah het lo ding uh hi. Ahi zongin amaute kiang panin zineipa a kilakkhiat ding hun hong tung dinga, tua hun ciangin amaute in an a tang ding uh hi.
Kuamah in a ton nai lo puanbek thak tawh puan lui a phop kei hi. Tua bangin phop leh puanbek thak a ton ciangin a lui kaigawmin a vang a gol semsem ding hi.

Kuamah in savun um lui sungah leenggahzu thak thun lo hi. Kithun leh a savun um phukham dinga, a leenggahzu bua-in a savun um zong a sia a suak ding hi. Leenggahzu thak pen savun um thak sungah kithun bek hi. Tua ahih manin a nihin a sia om lo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

Tua bangin Jesuh in thu genin a om laitakin Jesuh kiangah Jew mi ulian khat hong pai-in ama mai-ah hong khukdin a, “Tu mahmahin ka tanu a si hi. Ahi zongin nang hong pai-in ama tungah na khut hong nga lecin amah hingkik ding hi,” ci-in a thum hi.
Jesuh zong dingpah a, a nungzuite tawh tua mipa a zui uh hi.
Tua laitakin kum sawm le kum nih tawntung a si a luang numei khat Jesuh’ nungah hong pai-in a puan mongteep a lawngsim hi.
Tua numei in, “A puan va lawng bek leng zong ka dam ding hi,” ci-in a lungsimah ngaihsun hi.
Jesuh zong hong kihei a, tua numei a muh ciangin, “Ka tanu aw, na lung kinuamsak in. Na upna in nang hong damsak khinta hi,” a cih khit phetin tua numei a dampah hi.
Jew mi ulianpa’ inn-ah Jesuh a tun ciangin tamngai tum mite le mihonpi a gamlum henhan a muh ciangin,
“Na vekpi-un pai khia un. Hih numeino a si hi lo a, a ihmu bek ahi hi,” a ci hi. Ahi zongin amaute in Jesuh zahpihin a nuihsan uh hi.
Ahi zongin mihonpite a pualamah a kipaikhiatsak khit ciangin tua numeino omna-ah Jesuh tumin a khut a va let ciangin tua numeino hong tho hi.
Hih thupiang tua gam khempeuh ah a kizel hi.
Tua lai panin Jesuh a pai khiat ciangin mittaw mi nih in a nungah hong zui-in nakpitakin kiko uh a, “David’ suan Jesuh aw, kote hong hehpih in,” ci-in a thum uh hi.

Inn-ah Jesuh a lut ciangin mittaw mi nihte in zong hong zui uh hi. Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Na mit uh khua hong musak thei dingin hong um na hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin amaute in, “Topa aw, ka hong um uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute’ mit lawnsak a, “Na upna uh tawh kizui-in note tungah hong piang tahen,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in khua mukik uh a, Jesuh in amau tegel kiangah, “Hih thupiang kuamah theisak kei un,” ci-in khauh takin a gen hi.
Ahi zongin amaute pai khia uh a, tua gam sung khempeuh ah hih thu a zasak uh hi.
Tua mi nihte a pai khiat laitakun mi pawlkhat in dawi a veina hangin a pau thei lo mi khat, Jesuh kiangah a hong paipih uh hi.
Ama sung panin dawi a kihawlkhiat khit phetin tua mipa hong pautheikik pah hi. Mihonpite in lamdangsa mahmah uh a, “Israel gam sungah hih bang thu piang ngei nai lo hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ahi zongin Farisi mite in, “Dawimang lian penpa min tawh hih bangin dawi a hawl khia ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua bangin khuapite le khuaneute-ah Jesuh pai kawikawi a, a kikhopna uh innte-ah thu hilhin, Pasian’ ukna hangin a lungdamhuai thute gen a, natna nam khempeuh a damsak hi.
Mihonte a muh ciangin, a cing nei lo tuuhon bangin gimna ngahin lungkhamin om uh ahih manin hehpihhuai a sa hi.
Tua ahih manin a nungzuite kiangah, “Anlak ding tampi om napi-in anlak na a sem ding mi tawmbek a om hi.
Tua ahih manin ama an a la dingin an nei Topa in nasem tampi hong sawl nadingin thu ngen un,” a ci hi.
Jesuh in a nungzui sawm le nihte sam a, dawite a hawl khiat theih nading uh le natna nam khempeuh a damsak theih nadingun amaute tungah vangliatna a pia hi.
Tua sawltak sawm le nihte’ min in: A masa-in Simon (Peter zong a kici pa) le a naupa Andru, Zebedi’ tapa James le a naupa Johan,
Filip le Bartholomew, Thomas le siahdongpa Matthai, Alfeas’ tapa James, Thaddeas,
Simon (gam khual pa) le Jesuh a lehhek Iskariot’ tapa Judas ahi uh hi.
Jesuh in hih mi sawm le nihte sawl a, “Gentail mite gam sung ahi a, Samaria mite khua sungah ahi zongin lut kei un.
Tuu bangin a mangthang Israel mite lakah va pai zaw un.
Na paina peuh uhah, ‘Vantung ki-ukna hong naita hi,’ ci-in thu va hilh un.
Cinate damsakin, misite hingsakin, miphakte damsakin, dawite va hawl khia un. Man piak kul loin hih vangliatna na ngah uh bangin hih vangliatna na zatna uhah zong man va ngen kei un.
Kham ahi a, ngun ahi a, sumngo ahi zongin sum peuhmah na ip sung uhah keng kei un.

Khualzinna-ah an ngenin puak nading ip ahi a, khedap ahi a, ciangkhut ahi zongin keng kei unla, puanak zong a val kengthuah kei un. Nasem mite pen amau sapna teeng mite in a piak ding a ngeina ahi hi.

“Khuapi ahi a, khuaneu ahi zongin khua khat peuhpeuh na tun uh ciangin tua khua sungah note zin hong tungsak nuam kua om ahi hiam, ci-in zong unla, na muh uh ciangin tuate’ inn-ah tungin, tua khua na nusiat mateng uh tua lai mahah omsuak pah un.
Inn khat peuhpeuhah na lut uh ciangin a mite hopihin thupha na pia un.
Tua na hopihna uh innsunga mite in note hong tunsaknop leh na hopihna thupha uh amaute tungah kip dinga, ahi zongin hong tunsaknop kei uhleh na hopihna thupha uh na dokkik ding uh hi.
Inn khat peuhpeuh in ahi a, khua khat peuhpeuh in ahi zongin note hong tunsaknop kei a, na thugen uh hong ngaihnop kei leh tua lai panin pai khia unla, na khe uha leivui baangte sinkhiat un.
Thukhen ni ciangin tua khuamite’ thuakna sangin Sodom khua le Gomorrah khuamite’ thuakna ol zaw lai ding ahihna thu hoihtakin phawk un.
“Ngiahon lakah tuu a kikhah bangin note hong sawl khia ka hih manin gul bangin pilvang unla, vakhu bangin migi un.
Mi pawlkhatte in note hong manin zumah hong paipih ding uh a, amaute’ kikhopna inn sungah hong sat gawp ding uh ahih manin hoihtakin kidawm un.
Keima hangin gam ukte le kumpite mai-ah thu hong kisit ding hi. Hih bang na tuah uh ciangin thu hong sit mite le Gentail mite tungah Lungdamna Thu gen theih nading hunhoih a nei na hi uh hi.
Tua bangin thusitna a thuak dingin hong kipaipih ciangin, bang gen ding ihi hiam, ci-in lunghimawh kei un. A hun a tun ciangin na gen ding teng uh hong kihilh ding hi.
Thu na gen uh ciangin note’ gen hi loin, na Pa uh’ Kha Siangtho in note tungtawnin thu a gen ding ahi hi.
Unau le unau, pa in a ta, tate in a nu a pate langpangin sihna a thuak dingin khatlekhat kiheek ding uh hi.
Keima hangin Gentail mi khempeuh in note hong mudah ding uh hi. Ahi zongin a tawp dongin a thuakzo mite in hotkhiatna a ngah ding uh hi.
Khua khatah note hong kibawlsiat leh khuadang khatah tai un. Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Israel khua khempeuh na khit ma-un Mihing Tapa hong pai ding hi.
“A siapa sangin a sang naupangte lian zaw ngei lo a, a topa sangin a silate lian zaw ngei lo hi.

Tua ahih manin sang naupangte pen a siapa uh tawh a kibat uhleh a lungkim ding uh hi a, silate pen a tote uh tawh a kibat uhleh a lungkim ding uh ahi hi. Innteek lutang pa pen Beelzebul hong ci uh ahihleh a innkuanpih mite tua sangin min sia zaw tawh hong ko zaw lai ding uh hi lo ahi hiam?
“Tua ahih manin kuamah kihta kei un. A kiseelte khatvei teitei kimu dinga, thusimte khatvei teitei thulang suak ding hi.
Zan khuamial sunga kong gente, sun khuavak sungah taangko unla, a simthamin kong huau thute, innkhumdawn zangah na taangko un.
Pumpi a thah khit ciangin kha a that thei lote na kihta kei un. Hell khuk sungah pumpi le kha a nihin a susia thei pa na kihta zaw un.
Gitta nih ciangin mat khatin kizuak lel hi lo ahi hiam? Tua hinapi-in na Pa uh’ thukim lohin tua gittate khat nangawn lei-ah mawkkiat lo hi.
Note ahihleh na lu tung uha na sammal phazah nangawn uh hong kiciamtehsak hi.
Tua ahih manin lau kei un. Gitta tampi sangin note na manpha zaw uh hi.
“Keima mi ahihna thu mite’ theihin a gen khia mite, kei zong vantungah ka Pa’ mai-ah keima mi ahihna thu ka gen ding hi.
Ahi zongin keima mi ahihna thu mite’ theihin a gen khia nuam lote, kei zong vantungah ka Pa’ mai-ah keima mi ahihna thu ka gen khia nuam kei ding hi.
“Leitungah kilemna a omsak dingin hong pai hi, ci-in hong ngaihsun kei un. Kilemna a omsak dingin a hong pai ka hi kei a, kido nading namsau a khah dingin a hong pai ka hizaw hi.
Tate le pate a kidosak ding, tanute le nute a kidosak ding, monute le teeknute a kidosak dingin a hong pai ka hi hi.
Mi khat adingin a gal lian penpen ama innkuanpih mite mah hong hi ding hi.
“Kei sangin a nu a pa a it zawte kei tawh kilawm lo a, kei sangin a tapa a tanu a it zawte kei tawh kilawm lo hi.
Ama singlamteh mah puatawm lopi-in ka nung hong zuite kei tawh kilawm lo hi.
Hih leitung nuntakna a hon nuamte in a nuntakna taktak taanlawh dinga, keima hangin a nuntakna a taanlawhte in a nuntakna taktak a ngah ding uh hi.
“Na thugen uh a hong sangte in kei’ thu a hong sang hi a, kei a hong sangte in kei a hong sawl pa zong a sang ahi uh hi.
Pasian’ thugen ahihna hangin Pasian’ thugen mi a sangte in Pasian’ thugente’ thaman ngah dinga, mihoih hihna hangin mihoih a sang mite in mihoihte’ thaman ngah ding uh hi.
Keima nungzui mi a neu pen khat nangawn, keima nungzui ahihna hangin tuivot hai khat bek a suahte nangawn in pel loin thaman a ngah ding lamtak phawk un,” ci-in a vaikhak hi.
Jesuh in a nungzui sawm le nihte a vaikhakna a man khit ciangin tua kiimnai-a om khuate-ah thuhilh ding le thugen dingin tua mun panin a pai khia hi.
Tuiphumpa Johan in thong sung panin Jesuh’ nasepnate a zak ciangin Jesuh kiangah a nungzuite sawl a,
“Nang pen a hong pai ding pa na hi hiam, tua ahih kei leh adang na lamen lai ding ka hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dongsak hi.
Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Va ciahkik unla, tu-a na zakte uh le na muh uh thute va gen un:
Mittawte in khua mukik a, khebaite pai theikikin, miphakte damkik a, bilngongte in khua za kikin, misite hingkik a, mizawngte tungah Lungdamna Thu a kihilhnate va gen un.
Kei hong umte pen a lungdamhuai mahmah ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

Tua thudong mite a ciah khiat khit ciangin Jesuh in mihonte kiangah Johan’ thu gen a, “Gamlakah Johan kiangah na pai uh ciangin bang a mu dingin kilamen na hi uh hiam? Huih in a mut awn diamdiam lopakungte a en ding maw?
Tua hi lo ahihleh bang a mu dingin kilamen na hi uh hiam? Puan hoih nono a silhpa a mu dingin kilamen maw? A taktakin ci lehang, puan hoih nono a silhte pen kumpi inn sungah om uh hi.
Tua ahih kei leh bang a en dingin pai na hi uh hiam? Kamsangpa a en ding maw? Hi hi; kamsangpa a en dingin na pai uh a, tua na muhpa uh kamsang mawkmawk ciang bek hi loin a lian zaw khat ahi hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Lai Siangtho in Johan’ thu a genna-ah,‘Na pai nading lampia hong khol dinginnangma mai-ahka kamtai pa ka sawl hi,’ci-in Pasian in gen hi, ci-in kigelh hi.
Leitung mi khempeuh sung pan Tuiphumpa Johan a lian pen ahi hi. Ahi zongin vantung ki-ukna sungah a neu pen i cihte nangawn Johan sangin lian zaw lai hi.
Tuiphumpa Johan’ thuhilh hun a kipan tu ciang dong, mite in vantung ki-ukna thu hong kituhteh gawp uh a, thahatthu hong ciam uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Tuiphumpa Johan thuhilh a kipat hun ciang dong, kamsangte khempeuh le Moses Thukham khempeuh in hih vantung ki-ukna thu gen belin a nei uh hi.
Tua thu kigensa na upnop uhleh, a kigenkhol bangin a hong pai ding Elijah a kici pen Tuiphumpa Johan ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin bil neite in na za ta un.
“Ahi zongin tuhun mite bang tawh genteh ding ka hi hiam cih leh: Mihon omna lamkabomah a tu naupang a kimawlte tawh kibang uh hi. Naupang honkhat in a lawmte kiangah,
‘Lam nading khuangkong tumsak uh hanginna lam nuam kei uh a,kah la ka sak uh hangin lahna kap nuam tuan kei uh hi,’a kicite tawh a kibang uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Tuiphumpa Johan hong pai a, amah in zu le an tangin a om ciangin, ‘Dawivei hi,’ a ci uh hi.

Mihing Tapa hong pai leuleu a, zune anne-in a om ciangin, ‘Zuhai anhai pa; siahdongte le midangte in a kikholhpih nop loh mite tawh a kikhawlpa,’ ci leuleu uh hi. Ahi zongin Pasian’ pilna a man taktakna thu a gah panin hong kilang hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jesuh in nalamdang tampi a bawlna mun khuapi mite kisik nuam lo uh ahih manin taiibawl ding kipan a,

“Khorazin khuapi mite le Bethsaida khuapi mite aw, gimna lianpi na thuak ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh note khua sungah a hong kilak na lamdangte, Taia le Sidon khua sungah kilak hileh amaute in kisikna limin sawtpekin puanhampi silhin vut kinuh ding uh hi.
Tua ahih manin thukhen ni ciangin note’ thuakna sangin, Taia le Sidon khuamite’ thuakna baih zaw lai ding ahihna thu phawk ta un.

Kapernaum khuapi mite aw, van a sangna munah hong kipahtawi ding sa na hi uh hiam? Hell khuk sungah hong kilawnsuk ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh note’ khua sunga hong kibawl na lamdangte, Sodom khua sungah kibawl hileh tuni dongin tua khua kip lai ding hi.
Tua ahih manin thukhen ni ciangin note’ thuakna sangin Sodom khuamite’ thuakna baih zaw lai ding ahihna thu phawk ta un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Vantung le leitung Topa ahi ka Pa aw, mipilte le misiamte tungah na ip hih thute, bangmah a thei lo hih mite tungah lak na hih manin ka nuam hi.
Pa aw, hih pen nangma deihna le na lungkimna bangin na hih ahi hi.
“Ka Pa in kei tungah na khempeuh hong pia khin hi. Pa sim loh Tapa a thei kuamah om lo a, Tapa le Tapa in a theihsaknop mite sim loh, pa a thei kuamah om lo hi.
“Na semin vangik pua-in a gim mite khempeuh aw, ka kiangah hong pai ta un. Note tungah lungsim tawldamna kong pia ding hi.
Keima hakkol zamin kisuan unla, kei kiangah hong kisin dih un. Kei pen kiniamkhiatin nem hithiat ka hih manin ka kiangah na tawl uh a dam ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh note kong suat ding ka hakkol nuam a, na puak ding uh van zong a zang mah ahi hi,” ci-in a gen khia hi.
Tua zawh a sawt loin Sabbath ni khatin mangbuh lo nawkin Jesuh a pai hi. A nungzuite a gil uh kial ahih manin mangbuhvuite zutin a ne uh hi.
Farisi mite in a muh uh ciangin Jesuh kiangah, “En in, Sabbath ni-in i hih dingin a kilawm lo gamtatna na nungzuite gamta uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “David le a kikholhpihte a gilkial laitakun David’ gamtatna thu sim ngei lo na hi uh hiam?
Pasian’ inn sungah amah lut a, siampite lobuang, amah le a kikholhpihte in a nek theih ding ahi lo Ompihna Anlum la-in amah le a kikholhpihte in a ne uh hi.
Tua ahih kei leh zong siampite in Sabbath sim mahin biakinn sungah Sabbath thukham khial napi-in mawhsakna a ngah tuan lohna thu uh, Moses Thukham sungah sim ngei lo na hi uh hiam?
Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Tua biakinn sangin a lian zaw khat hih lai-ah hong om hi.
Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘Ganhing tawh biak ding ka deih kei a, migitna ka deih zaw hi,’ a cihnopna thu teltakin thei le-uhcin a mawh lopi kimlai na mawhsak kei ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Mihing Tapa pen Sabbath ni a ukpa ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua lai panin Jesuh paisuakin amau kikhopna inn sungah a lut hi.

Tua lai-ah a khut langkhat a zaw mi khat a na om hi. Jesuh gamta khial hi, ci-in a mawhna a zong nuam mi pawlkhat tua lai-ah om uh ahih manin tua mite in Jesuh kiangah, “Sabbath ni-in cina damsak ding a kilawm mah ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Note khatpeuh in tuu khat nei unla, Sabbath ni-in dum sungah tua tuu kia leh, tua tuu va lenin kai khiato ding hi lo na hi uh hiam?
Mi pen tuu sangin nakpitakin manpha zaw ahih manin Sabbath ni-in a hoih sep ding a kilawm ahi hi,” ci-in a dawn khit ciangin
a mipa kiangah, “Na khut zan in,” a ci hi. A mipa in zong a khut zanpah a, midangte mah bangin hoihtakin a damkik hi.
Ahi zongin Farisi mite pai khia uh a, Jesuh a thah theih nading uh vai a hawm uh hi.
Jesuh in amah a kisawmna thu a theih ciangin tua mun panin a pai khia hi. Mi tampi in amah hong zui uh hi. Amah in cina mi khempeuh damsak a,
Pasian in kamsang Isaiah tungtawnin a gen thu a tun theih nadingin, kuama kiangah ama thu a gen loh nadingun thu a pia hi. Tua a genna-ah,
“Keimah in ka teelsaka nasem pa, ka it mahmah,ka lungkimna pa en un.Keima Khaama tungah ka pia dinga,Gentail mite tungahupna man a pulak ding hi.
Amah in thu seel loin,a aw sangsak lo dinga,konglakah zonga awging kiza lo ding hi.
Amah in a zawngkhal mitedopbawl dinga,a cimawh mite tungahmigi ding hi.Thuman thutanga gualzawhsak matengkhawl ngei lo ding hi.
Gentail mite in amah bek mahlametin nei ding uh hi,”ci hi.
Tua ciangin mi pawlkhat in Jesuh kiangah mittawt le pau theih loh a thuah dawivei mi khat hong paipih uh hi. Jesuh in amah damsak ahih manin amah hong pau thei-in khua zong hong mu thei hi.
Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in lamdangsa mahmah uh a, “Hih pa, i lam etet David’ suan hi lo ding ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Ahi zongin Farisi mite in hih thu a zak uh ciangin, “Dawimangpa Beelzebul min tawh dawi a hawl khia hi lel hi,” a ci uh hi.

Jesuh in amaute’ ngaihsutna thei ahih manin amaute kiangah, “Gam khat peuhpeuh, a gammite kiphelkhamin pawlkhat le pawlkhat kido le-uh tua gam a sia suak ding hi; khua khat ahi a, innkuan khat ahi zongin kiphelkhamin kido le-uh kip lo ding hi.
Tua mah bangin Satan le Satan kihawl khia le-uh a ukna bangci kip theih ding ahi hiam?
Keimah in Beelzebul vangliatna tawh dawite hawl khia ka hih leh na mipihte un a kua’ vangliatna tawh hawl khia ahi uh hiam? Na mipihte un na ngaihsut khialhna uh hong kilangsak hi.
Note’ ngaihsut bang hi loin, Pasian’ Kha in dawi hawl khiat nading vangliatna kei tungah hong pia ahih manin note lakah Pasian’ ukna hun hong kipan khin ahihna hong kilang hi.

Mi khatpeuh in mi thahat khat pa’ inn sungah lutin a neihsate a laksak theih nadingin tua inn nei a thahatpa a hencip masak phot ding kisam hi. A hencip zawh khit ciang bekin a inn-ah lutin a neihsate la thei pan hi.
Kei hong pawlpih lo peuhmah keima lang hi uh a, kei hong kaihkhoppih lo peuhmah a thehthang ahi uh hi.
Tua ahih manin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Mihingte’ kampau khialhna le gamtat khialhnate kimaisak thei dinga, ahi zongin Kha Siangtho langpangin a gensiate kimaisak lo ding hi.
Mihing Tapa langpangin a gensiate a mawhna uh kimaisak thei dinga, ahi zongin Kha Siangtho langpangin a gensiate pen tuhun a kipan a tawntungin a mawhna uh kimaisak lo ding hi.
“Singgah limci a gah theih nadingin a kung a cidam phot ding kisam a, a kung gina kei leh a gah limci lo hi. Tua ahih manin singkung khat a pianzia pen a gahin hong kithei hi.
Gul bangin ngian a zang note aw, migilo na hih uh ciangin bangci-in thuhoih gen thei mah ding na hi uh hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh lungsim sunga thu om pen kam in a gen khia hi bek hi.
Mihoihte in a hoih a khol teng suah khia a, migilote in gitlohna a khol teng a suah khia ahi hi.
Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Thukhen ni ciangin mi khempeuh in phattuamna a om lo a kampaunate uh khempeuh bangin thusitna a thuak ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh nomau kampauna tawh kizui-in thu hong kikhen dinga, dik hi, cihna ahi a, mawh hi, cihna ahi zongin na ngah nadingun nomau kampau mah hong kibulphuh ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Thukham hilh siate le Farisi mi pawlkhat in Jesuh kiangah, “Sia aw, nalamdang khat nong lah ding ka deih uh hi,” ci-in a ngen uh hi.

Ahi zongin Jesuh in, “Tuhun a mite bangzahin giloin, Pasian’ thu thei lo ahi uh hiam? Na lamdang ka bawl ding na hong ngen tazen uh hi. Jonah thu tawh kisai nalamdang longal adang hong kilaklo ding hi.
Ngasa gilpi sungah sun thum le zan thum sung Jonah a om mah bangin Mihing Tapa zong sun thum le zan thum sung mah lei sungah om ding hi.

Jonah in amaute kiangah thu a hilh ciangin a mawhna panun kisikkik uh ahih manin thukhen ni ciangin Nineveh khuamite in note mawhsakna thu hong gen ding uh hi. Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Tu mahmahin note kiangah Jonah sangin a lian zaw khat a om hi.

Leitaw lam gam kumpinu in Solomon’ pilna thu a ngai dingin leitung phelkhat kantanin hong pai ahih manin thukhen ni ciangin amah in note mawhsakna thu hong gen ding hi. Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Tu mahmahin hih lai-ah Solomon sangin a lian zaw khat a om hi.
“Mi khatpeuh sung panin dawi a kihawlkhiat khit ciangin a ten nading mun keuna zongin a vak kawikawi hi. Ahi zongin a ten nading mun a muh zawh loh ciangin,
‘Ka pai khiatnasa inn mahah ciahkik ning,’ ci hi. A hong paikik ciangin tua inn na awng lai a, kipuah siangin hoihtakin a om a mu hi.

Tua ciangin va paikik a, amah sangin a siahuai zaw dawi sagih hong tunpihin tua mipa sungah a teeng uh hi. Tua ahih manin tua mipa pianzia pen a masa huna sangin a sia zaw hi. Tua ahih ciangin tuhuna migilote zong hih mipa’ pianzia mah tawh kibang ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua bangin mite kiangah thu genin a om laitakin a pualamah a nu le a naute in Jesuh hopih nuamin a om uh hi.
Tua ahih manin tua lai-ah a om mite khat in Jesuh kiangah, “Na nu le na naute in nang hong hopih nuamin a pualamah om uh hi,” a ci hi.
Ahi zongin Jesuh in tua mipa kiangah, “Ka nu kua bangte hi a, ka naute kua bangte ahi uh hiam?” a cih khit ciangin
a nungzuite lam kawk a, “Hihte pen ka nu le ka sanggamte ahi uh hi.
Vantungah a om ka Pa’ deihna bangin a gamta mi peuhmah ka sanggam pasal, ka sanggam numei, ka nu ahi uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ni mahin tua inn panin Jesuh pai khia a, tuili gei-ah pai-in thuhilh dingin a tu hi.
Ama kiimah a hong kikhawm mi tamlua ahih manin amah gunkuang tungah pai-in tu a, mihonte ahihleh tuili gei-ah a omsak hi.
Amah in thugentehna a tuamtuam zangin thu tampi hilhin a genin-ah: “Khaici vawhpa khaici vawh dingin a kuan khia hi.
Khaici a vawh ciangin pawlkhatte lo lai lam dungah tu a, vasate hong leengin a ne uh hi.
Pawlkhatte, suang a kitawphahna leidaina mun a tu hi. Lei thuk loin lum ahih manin a khaici popah hi.
Ahi zongin ni hong sat ciangin ankungte in zung thuk kha zo lo uh ahih manin tua ankungnote vulin a keu hi.
Pawlkhatte, lingbulsum a omna mun leilak tu a, lingbulsumte hong selin hong khang ahih manin ankungte a dep gawp hi.
Ahi zongin pawlkhatte, lei hoihna mun tu-in hong khang hi. Pawlkhatte in a zah zakhat, pawlkhatte in a zah sawmguk, adangte in a zah sawmthum a gah hi,” ci-in a gen khit ciangin,
“Zak nading bil a neite in hih thu na za ta un,” ci-in Jesuh in a thugen a khum hi.
Tua ciangin nungzuite in Jesuh va naihin ama kiangah, “Bang hangin thugentehna zangin amaute tungah thu gen na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Jesuh in, “Vantung ki-ukna tawh kisai thusim note tungah hong kihilh a, ahi zongin amaute tungah kihilh lo hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh a neisate tungah kipia thuahin hau semsem dinga, a nei lote tung panin a neihsa sunsun nangawn kilaksak ding hi.
Amaute in enen napi-in mu thei lo uh a, ngaingai napi-in za thei lo, tel thei lo uh ahih manin thugentehna zangin thu a gen ka hi hi.
Kamsang Isaiah’ thugen kholhna, hih thu tawh kisai-ah amau adingin tung taktak hi. Tua a genna-ah,‘Na zakzak uh hanginna tel kei ding uh a,na etet uh hanginna mu kei ding uh hi.

Hih mite’ lungsimmawl mahmah hi;a bil uh bingsak uh a,a mit uh a si uh hi.Tua bang hi kei le-uh,a mit uh tawh mu-in,a bil uh tawh za-in,a lungsim un tel dinga,kei lamahamaute hong kihei-in,amaute ka damsak ding hi,ci-in Pasian in gen hi,’ci-in kigelh hi.
Ahi zongin note’ mit in mu-in na bil un za ahih manin a hampha mahmah na hi uh hi.
Ahi taktakin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Kamsangte le Pasian’ mi tampite in note’ muhte mu nuam mahmah napi-in mu lo uh a, note’ zakte za nuam mahmah napi-in za lo uh hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin tu-in khaici vawhpa thugentehna thu na ngai un.

Mi pawlkhat in Pasian’ hong ukna tawh kisai a lungdamhuai thu za napi-in a thu theitel lo uh ahih manin Dawimangpa hong pai-in amau lungsim sunga a kivawh thu a lakkhiatsak hi. Hih bangte pen lolai lampi dung a tu khaicite tawh kibang hi.
Suang kitawphah leilak a tu khaicite pen Pasian’ thu a zak ciangun lungdam takin a sangpahte a cihnopna ahi hi.
Ahi zongin amaute sungah thuktum zo lo ahih manin tawlkhat sung bek um uh hi. Tua ahih manin Pasian’ thu hangin haksatna ahi a, bawlsiatna ahi zongin khat peuhpeuh a tun ciangin tawpkikpah uh hi.

Lingbulsum omna leilakah a tu khaicite pen Pasian’ thu za napi-in amau nuntakna sung uhah leitung lunghihmawhna le hauh nopnate in Pasian’ thu vuknelh ahih manin bangmah a suak khia zo lote a cihnopna ahi hi.

Lei hoihna munah a tu khaicite pen Pasian’ thu a zak ciangin a tel mite a cihnopna ahi hi. Tua bang mite adingin Pasian’ thu in man nei a, pawlkhatte adingin a zah zakhat, pawlkhatte adingin a zah sawmguk, pawlkhatte adingin a zah sawmthumin Pasian’ thu in man a nei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jesuh in thugentehna dang khat gen a, “Vantung ki-ukna pen bang tawh kibang hiam cih leh: A lo ah taangci hoih a vawhpa tawh kibang hi.
Ahi zongin zan khat, mite a ihmut kalun galte khat hong pai-in taang lakah tahum tang vawhin a pai khia hi.
Taangte hong po-in a vuih hun ding ciangin tahum kungte zong hong lianin hong kilang hi.
Tua ciangin lonei pa’ nasemte ama kiangah hong pai-in, ‘Na lolai-ah na vawh khaici pen taangci hoihte ahi hi. Hih tahumte koi pan a hong piang ahi hiam?’ a cih ciangin
amah in, ‘Galte’ vawh ahi hi,’ ci-in a dawng hi. A nasemte in ama kiangah, ‘Tua ahihleh kote va kuanin ka va bot ding uh hiam?’ ci-in a dong uh hi.
Ahi zongin amah in, ‘Va bot kei un. Tahumte bot le-uhcin taang tawh na botkhawm kha ding uh hi.

Anlak hun mateng a nam nihin tuaci om phot hen. Anlak hun ciangin anlate kiangah, “Tahumte bot masa unla, meikhukah khul dingin lomhen un. Ahi zongin taangte la-in ka ansal-ah hong sung un,” ka ci ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jesuh in thugentehna dang khat gen leuleu a, “Vantung ki-ukna pen bang tawh kibang hiam cih leh, mi khat in a lo sungah a vawh ankam tang tawh kibang hi.

Khaici khempeuh lak panin ankam tang a neu pen ahi hi. Ahi zongin a khan khit ciangin ankung lakah a gol pen suak ahih manin vasate in a hiang tungah bu a tom theihna zah ding ciang hong suak thei hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin thugentehna khat mah gen leuleu a, “Vantung ki-ukna pen bang tawh kibang hiam cih leh, nupi khat in annel seu thum dim meek manin silngo sawh a, a vekpi-in silngo in zelin a pawmsak tawh kibang hi,” a ci hi.
Jesuh in hih thute khempeuh, thugentehna vive zangin thu hilh a, thugentehna zang loin thu khat beek a gen kei hi.
Hih bangin thugentehna a zatna pen kamsang Isaiah in,“Thugentehna zanginthu ka gen dinga,leitung piancil a kipana kithei lo thuteka gen ding hi,”ci-in a gen kholhsakna thu a tun nading ahi hi.
Tua ciangin mihonte lak panin Jesuh pai khia-in inn sungah a lut hi. A nungzuite ama kiangah hong pai uh a, “Lolai-a om Tahum Thugentehna a khiatna hong gen in,” a cih uh ciangin
Jesuh in, “Taangci hoih a vawhpa pen Mihing Tapa ahi hi.
Lolai pen leitung hi a, taangci hoih i cih pen Pasian’ ukna sungah a om mite ahi uh hi. Tahumte pen Gilopa tawh a kipawl mite hi a,
tahum tang a vawh galpa pen Dawimangpa ahi hi. Anlak hun pen leitung bei nading hun hi a, anla nasemte pen vantung mite ahi hi.
Tahumte kikaikhawmin meikhuk sungah a kikhultum mah bangin leitung bei hun ciangin tua bangmahin kihih ding hi.
Mihing Tapa in a vantung mite hong sawl dinga, ama ukna sungah a om migilote le mi a mawh nadingin a bawl mi khempeuh kaikhawmin
meikhukpi sungah tua bang mite lawn ding uh a, tua lai-ah amaute kapin a hagawi ding uh hi.
Tua hun ciangin Pasian’ mite ahihleh a Pa uh Ukna sungah ni bangin a taang ding uh hi. Zak nading bil a neite in hih thu na za ta un.

“Vantung ki-ukna pen lolai-ah a kiseel sum tawh kibang hi. Mi khat in a muh ciangin limtakin a seelpha hi. Amah lungdam mahmahin a inn-ah ciahpah a, a neih khempeuh a zuak khit ciangin tua lo a lei hi.
“Vantung ki-ukna pen sumbawlpa in a zon kep hoih pente tawh zong kibang hi.
Sumbawlpa in a manpha diak pawl kep khat a muh ciangin ciahpahin a neih khempeuh a zuak khit ciangin tua kep a lei hi.
“Vantung ki-ukna pen tui sungah kipaai-in ngasa namkim a awkna ngen tawh zong kibang hi.
Ngasa tampi tak a awk ciangin ngabengte in tui gei-ah a ngen uh kai khia-in tusuk uh a, nek theih ding ngasate, paipel sungah guangin, nek theih loh ding ngasate, a lawn khia uh hi.
Leitung hun bei ciangin zong tua bangmah hi ding hi. Vantung mite hong pai-in mihoihte lak panin migilote la khia-in,
meikhukpi sungah tua migilote a khul ding uh hi. Tua lai-ah kapin a hagawi ding uh hi.
“Hih ka thugente khempeuh a khiatna na thei uh hiam?” ci-in Jesuh in a dot ciangin amaute in, “Ka thei uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.

Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Vantung ki-ukna sungah a hong lut Thukham hilh siate khempeuh pen, a sumkholna panin a thak le a lui, a ut utin a la khia thei ziauziau sumnei pa tawh kibang uh hi,” a ci hi.
Jesuh in hih thugentehnate a gen khit ciangin tua lai panin pai khia-in

ama khua-ah pai a, kikhopna inn sungah thu a hilh hi. Ama thugen a za mite in lamdangsa mahmah uh a, “Hih mipa in hih bang pilna koilai panin ngah a, bang hangin hih bang na lamdangte bawl thei ahi hiam?
Khutsiam pa’ tapa hi lel a, a nu zong Mary a kici nu hilel hi lo ahi hiam? Ama naute zong James, Josef, Simon le Judas hi lo ahi uh hiam?
A nau numeite zong hih lai mah a om hi lo ahi uh hiam? Tua bang hinapi-in hih mipa in koi lai panin hih bang thuteng ngah thei ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih manin amah a sang zo kei uh hi. Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Kamsang khat pen, ama khua, ama behte le ama inn sung longal-ah kizahtakin pahtawina a ngah hi,” a ci hi.
Nazareth khuamite in amah a up lohna hangin tua khua-ah nalamdang tampi a bawl kei hi.
Tua hun laitakin Galilee gam sungteng a uksawn kumpi Herod in Jesuh’ thu a za hi.
Amah in a nuai-a uliante kiangah, “Hih pa pen Johan hi a, sihna panin a hingkik hi ding hi. Tua ahih manin hih bang nalamdang bawlna ding vangliatna nei hi ding hi,” a ci hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Herod in a nau Filip’ zi Herodias a tenpihna hangin Johan in Herod kiangah, “Na naupa’ zi na teenpih ding ngeina hi lo hi,” ci-in gen zelzel ahih manin Herod a heh suak a, Johan mansakin, khau khihsakin, thong sungah a khumsak hi.
Herod in Johan that nuam hi. Ahi zongin mite in kamsangin ngaihsun uh ahih manin mite a kihtakna hangin thatsak ngam lo hi.
Ahi zongin Herod’ suah ni pawi bawl hun hong tun ciangin mihonte mai-ah Herodias’ tanu hong laam ciangin Herod lungdam mahmah ahih manin,
“Na hong nget peuhpeuh kong pia ding hi,” ci-in a kiciam hi.
Tua numei in zong a nu’ ngaihsut piakna zui-in, “Kuangdai khat sungah Tuiphumpa Johan’ lutang, hih lai mahmahah hong pia in,” ci-in a ngen hi.
Kumpipa dah mahmah hi. Ahi zongin a kiciamnasa ahihna hang le a leenglate’ maitang a zahtakna hangin a ngetna a kipiak nadingin thu a pia hi.
Tua ahih manin mi sawlin thongah Johan’ lutang a tansak hi.
Kuangdai khat tawh tua a lutang hong kipaipihin numei kiangah kipia a, tua numei in a nu kiangah a paipih hi.
Tua ciangin Johan’ nungzuite hong pai uh a, a luang la-in a vui khit uh ciangin Jesuh kiangah hih thu a ko uh hi.

Jesuh in tua thu a zak ciangin tua mun panin kihem khia-in gamdaihna mun a zuan dingin gunkuang tawh a pai hi. Mite in ama pai khiatna thu a theih uh ciangin a khua ciat panun lei lam tawnin Jesuh nung hong zui uh hi.
Tui gei-ah Jesuh a tun ciangin mihon tampi a na om a mu hi. Amaute hehpihhuai sa a, a cinate a damsak hi.
Ni a tum kuan ciangin nungzuite in Jesuh kiangah, “Hih lai mun gamlak hi a, ni zong tum dektak ta hi. Hih kiimnai-a om khuate-ah mite va pai-in a an ding uh a lei nadingun sawl khia in,” a ci uh hi.
Ahi zongin Jesuh in, “Amaute a pai khiat ding kisam lo hi. Amaute’ nek ding bang khat peuhpeuh pia un,” ci-in a dawn ciangin
amaute in, “Anlum nga le ngasa tawn nih lobuang bangmah dang om lo hi,” a ci uh hi.
Jesuh in, “Tuate hong paipih un,” ci-in a sawl khit ciangin,

lopa tungah mihonte a tut nadingun a sawl hi. Tua ciangin anlum nga le ngasa tawn nih la-in vantung lam ento a, Pasian tungah a lungdamna a ko hi. Tua ciangin anlum balnenin a nungzuite pia a, a nungzuite in mihonte mai-ah a lui uh hi.
Mi khempeuh in ne-in a kham khit uh ciangin a khamvalte uh khawmkik uh a, paipel sawm le nih a dim hi.
Tua an a ne mite, numei le naupang sim loh, pasal cingteng mi tul nga bang a pha hi.
Tua ciangin Jesuh in mihonpite a ciahsak laitakin a nungzuite gunkuangah tuangsak a, tuili gal khatah a pai dingin ama mai-ah a ma paisak hi.
Mihonte a ciah khit ciangin thungen dingin mual tunglamah a paito hi. Khuamial ciangin Jesuh guakbek gamlakah om a,
ahi zongin nungzuite pen lei tawh gamlapi kihal khinta uh a, huih in amaute lehmut ahih manin gunkuang a kilok gawp hi.
Zingsang lam nai thum le nai guk kikal khawng ciangin a nungzuite kiang lam manawhin tui tungah Jesuh hong pai hi.
Ahi zongin nungzuite in tui tungah hong pai a muh uh ciangin lau mahmah uh a, “Sikha hi,” ci-in ngaihsun uh ahih manin a lau manun a awng uh hi.
Jesuh in amaute hopihpah a, “Na lungsim uh hangsak un. Keimah ka hi hi. Lau kei un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Peter in, “Topa aw, nang na hihtakpi leh, tui tung tawnin nang kiangah kei zong hong paisak in,” a ci hi.
Jesuh in, “Hong pai in,” a cih ciangin Peter zong gunkuang tung panin kum khia a, Jesuh’ omna lam manawhin tui tungah a pai hi.
Ahi zongin huihpi nung a muh ciangin lau a, tui sungah tum dektak ahih manin, “Topa aw, hong hon in,” a ci hi.
Jesuh in zong a khut tawh Peter zamin len a, “Upna cingtaak lopa aw, bang ci-a hong tuaci muanlah na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Gunkuang tungah a kahtoh khit uh ciangin huihpi nung a dai hi.
Tua ciangin gunkuang sungah a om nungzuite in Jesuh bia uh a, “Pasian’ Tapa taktak na hi hi,” ci-in a gen uh hi.
Tui a kantan khit uh ciangin Gennesaret gamah a tung uh hi.
Tua gam mite in Jesuh ahih lam a theih uh ciangin tua gam kiim khempeuh ah thu zasak uh a, cina khempeuh Jesuh kiangah a hong paipih uh hi.
Ama puanmongteep beek a lawnkhak theih nadingun Jesuh kiangah ngen uh a, a puanmongteep a lawng mi khempeuh in damna a ngah uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jerusalem khua panin Farisi mite le Thukham hilh siate, Jesuh kiangah hong pai uh a,
“Bang hangin na nungzuite in tangtawng pek panin a hong kihilh suksuk i pupa ngeinate zui lo uh ahi hiam? Amaute in an a nek ma-un a ngeina ding bangin a khut uh sil masa lo uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Jesuh in, “Bang hangin note in na pupa ngeina uh zui-in, Pasian’ thupiakna palsat zawsop na hi uh hiam?
Pasian in, ‘Na nu le na pa na zahtak in,’ ci a, tua banah, ‘A nu ahi a, a pa ahi zongin a gensiate in thahna thuak ding hi,’ ci lai hi.

Ahi zongin note in, ‘Mi khatpeuh in a nu ahi a, a pa ahi zongin a huh theih nading na khat peuhpeuh a neih leh, tua na pen Pasian ading hi, ci peuh leh, a nu le a pa piak kul nawn lo hi,’ ci-in thu na hilh uh hi.
Tua ahih manin na pupa ngeina uh na zuihna uh hangin Pasian’ thu na palsat uh hi.
Na tungthamun mihoih a kineihkhem mite aw, Isaiah in note’ thu a genna man mahmah hi. Tua a genna-ah,
‘Hih mite in a kampi bek uh tawhkei hong zahtak bawl uh a,ahi zongin a lungsim taktak uhkei tawh kigamla hi.
Mihingte’ bawltawm thukhamte,Pasian’ thukham zahinmite tungah hilh uh ahih maninkei hong biak hanguna kimanna om lo hi,’ci hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin Jesuh in ama kiangah mihonte sam a, “Ka thugen na ngai unla, hoihtakin na theitel un.
Kam sungah a tumsuk nate in mi ninsak lo a, kam sung panin a pusuak nate in mi a ninsak hizaw hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin nungzuite in Jesuh kiangah, “Farisi mite in hih na thugen a zak uh ciangin na a sak mahmahna thu uh na thei hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Jesuh in, “Vantungah a om ka Pa’ suan ahi lo kung khempeuh kibotkhia ding hi.
Hih mite lunghihmawh ngaihsut kei un. Amaute pen mittaw makai ahi uh hi. Mittaw khat in mittaw dang khat makaih leh a nihun hawkguam sungah kiakhawm ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Ahi zongin Peter in Jesuh kiangah, “Hih thugentehna a khiatna kote hong hilh in,” a ci hi.
Jesuh in, “Note nangawn in thei lo a, tel lo na hi uh hiam?
Kam sungah a tumsukte pen gil sung tawnin tua panin pai khiasuak hi lo ahi hiam?
Ahi zongin kam sung panin a pusuakte pen lungsim panin hong kipankhia hi a, hihte in mi ninsak thei hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh lungsim panin mi thahnopna, mi zi tawh mawhnopna, nungak tawh mawhnopna, guktakna, zuaugenna, mi gensiatna le ngaihsut hoih lo a tuamtuam hong piang khia hi.
Hih bang nate in mi ninsak a, khut sil loin annekna in mi ninsak lo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua lai panin Jesuh pai khia a, Taia khuapi le Sidon khuapi gam sung tengah a zin hi.
Tua gamah a teeng Kanaan nupi khat hong pai-in hong kiko a, “David’ suan, Topa aw, kei hong hehpih in. Ka tanu in dawi vei a, nasia mahmah hi,” ci-in a hong thum hi.
Ahi zongin Jesuh in kam khat beek paupih lo hi. Tua ciangin a nungzuite in Jesuh kiangah, “Hih nupi i nung zui-in kikoko ahih manin a ciah nadingin sawl in,” ci-in a thum uh hi.
Jesuh in, “Tuu bangin a mangthang Israel mite lak bekah kei hong kisawl hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Ahi zongin tua nupi hong pai-in Jesuh’ mai-ah khukdin a, “Topa aw, kei hong huh in,” a ci hi.
Jesuh in, “Tate’ annek ding laksakin ui khawite piak ding kilawm lo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Nupi in, “Hi mah hi, Topa aw; a topa sabuai tung panin a kia annengte, ui khawite in zong ne buang hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jesuh in tua nupi kiangah, “Nupi aw, na upna lian taktak hi. Na deihna bangin hong piang ding hi,” ci-in a dawn khit ciangin a tanu thakhatin a dampah hi.
Tua lai panin Jesuh pai khia-in Galilee Tuili kiimah a pai hi. Mual tung lamah kahto-in a tu hi.
Ama kiangah mihon tampi tak hong pai uh a, khebaite, khezawte, mittawte, a pau thei lote le cina dang tampi, Jesuh kiangah hong koih uh hi. Jesuh in tuate khempeuh a damsak hi.

A pau thei lote pau thei-in, khezawte damin, khebaite hoihtakin lam pai thei-in, mittawte in khua a muh theihkikna thu mihonpite in a muh uh ciangin lamdangsa mahmah uh a, Israel mite’ Pasian a phat uh hi.

Tua ciangin Jesuh in a nungzuite sam a, “Kei kiangah hih mite ni thum bang hong omkhin uh a, amaute in annek ding nei nawn lo uh ahih manin hehpihhuai ka sa hi. Lamkalah cimawh kha ding uh ahih manin gilkialin ka ciahsak nuam kei hi,” a ci hi.
Nungzuite in, “Mihon hih zah i piak ding, hih gamlakah koi panin an ngah ding ihi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Jesuh in, “Anlum bangzah nei na hi uh hiam?” a cih ciangin, “Lum sagih le ngasa neu tawm khat om hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jesuh in leilakah mihonte a tut nadingin a sawl hi.
Anlum sagih le a ngasate la-in Pasian tungah lungdamna a koh khit ciangin balnenin a nungzuite tungah pia a, a nungzuite in mihonpite mai-ah a lui uh hi.
Mihonte in ne-in a kham khit uh ciangin a khamval a neng a themte tawmkik uh a, paipel lian sagih a dim hi.
Tua an a ne mite, numei le naupang sim loh, pasal cingteng mihing tulli ahi hi.
Jesuh in mihonte a ciahsak khit ciangin gunkuang tungah tuangin Magadan gamah a pai hi.
Jesuh kiangah Farisi mite le Saddusi mite pawlkhat a hong pai uh hi. Amaute in Jesuh a mawhsak theih nading uh a deihna-in Pasian tawh a kipawl ahihna a lah nadingin lim khat a lah ding a ngen uh hi.
Ahi zongin Jesuh in, “Ni a tum khit nitak ciangin, ‘Van san ahih manin khua pha ding hi,’ na ci uh hi.

Zingsang hun ciangin, ‘Van sanin khua niim ahih manin guah zu ding hi,’ na ci thei uh hi. Note in van maitang na et uh ciangin khua pha ding le khua sia ding khen thei napi-in tuhun thute na theithei kei uh hi.
Tulai hun mite giloin, Pasian tawh kipawl lo uh hi. Lim a nget uh hangin Jonah lim sim loh adang kilak lo ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. Tua ahih manin amaute nusia-in a paisan hi.
Tui galkhat a tun uh ciangin nungzuite in anlum a puak mangngilh lam uh a phawk uh hi.
Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Farisi-te le Saddusi-te’ silngo hoihtakin kidawm un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin nungzuite in, “Anlum i puak mangngilh manin hih thu hong gen hi ding hi,” ci-in amaute khatlekhat a kikum uh hi.
Jesuh in hih amaute’ kihona thu thei ahih manin, “Upna neu mite aw, anlum na puak loh manun bang hangin kikum na hi uh hiam?
Tu ciang dong phawk thei nai lo lai na hi uh hiam? Anlum nga tawh mi tulnga a kivak khit ciangin paipel bangzah dim val lai cih thu phawk nawn lo na hi uh hiam?
Tua ahih kei leh zong, anlum sagih tawh mi tulli a kivak khit ciangin a kikhamval na kaihkhop uh paipel lian bangzah dim cih phawk nawn lo na hi uh hiam?
Hih thu ka gen ciangin anlum thu a gen ka hih loh lam bangci-in phawk thei lo lawmlawm na hi uh hiam? Farisi-te le Saddusi-te’ silngo hoihtakin kidawm un,” a ci hi.
Tua bangin thu a gen ciangin anlum a kisawh silngo thu a gen hi loin, Farisi-te le Saddusi-te’ thuhilhna a gen ahih lam a phawk pan uh hi.
Sisaria Filippi gam a tun uh ciangin Jesuh in a nungzuite kiangah, “Mite in Mihing’ Tapa kei kua hi hong ci uh ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.

Amaute in, “Pawlkhat in Tuiphumpa Johan hi, hong ci uh hi; pawlkhat in Elijah hi, hong ci uh hi; pawlkhat in Jeremiah ahih kei leh kamsang khat peuhpeuh hi ding hi, hong ci uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Tua ahihleh note in kei kua hi hong ci na hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin
Simon Peter in, “Nang pen a nungta Pasian’ Tapa, Khrih na hi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin Jesuh in ama kiangah, “Jonah’ tapa Simon aw, hoih mahmah hi. Hih thu, leitung pilna tawh na theihtawm hi lo a, vantungah a om ka Pa in nangma tungah hong hilh ahi hi.
Ke’n kong genin-ah: Nang pen suangneu a cihnopna Peter na hi hi. Hih suangpi tungah ka pawlpi ka lam dinga, sihna nangawn in zo zo ngei lo ding hi.

Vantung ki-ukna sung lut nading tawhtangte, nangma tungah kong pia dinga, hih leitungah hoih lo na cihte, vantungah zong a hoih lo hi dinga, hih leitungah hoih hi na cihte, vantungah zong a hoih hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah Khrih ahih lamtak, kuama kiangah a gen loh nadingun a nungzuite kiangah khauhtakin thu a pia hi.

Tua hun a kipanin Jesuh in a nungzuite kiangah, “Jerusalem khua-ah ka pai ding hi. Upate, siampi liante le Thukham hilh siate tung panin gimna tampi ka thuak ding hi. Kei hong kithat dinga, ni thum ni-in hong kihing kiksak ding hi,” ci-in teltakin gen a kipan hi.
Tua ciangin Peter in Jesuh pai khiatpih a, “Topa aw, hih bangin Pasian in piangsak kei hen. Nang tungah hih bang piang thei ngei peuhmah lo ding hi,” ci-in a taii bawl hi.
Ahi zongin Jesuh kihei-in Peter kiangah, “Satan aw, ka nungah om in. Hih na ngaihsutnate Pasian’ ngaihsutna hi loin mihingte’ ngaihsutna ahih manin ka lam a hong khaktan ding a suak hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jesuh in a nungzuite kiangah, “Mi khatpeuh ka nungzui a suahnop leh, ama deihna bangin gamta nawn loin, a singlamteh kisuanin hong zui ding hi.
Hih a leitung nuntakna a hu nuamte in a nuntakna bulpi nangawn tawh suplawh dinga, keima hangin hih a leitung nuntakna a suplawhte in a nuntakna bulpi hu zo ding hi.
Mi khatpeuh in hih leitung khempeuh a ngah hangin a nuntakna bulpi suplawh leh bang phattuamna om ahi hiam? A nuntakna bang tawh leikik thei nawn ding ahi hiam?
A Pa’ minthanna vang le a vantung mite tawh Mihing Tapa hong paikik dinga, mi khempeuh amau’ gamtatna ciat tawh a kizui-in a thuk ding hi.
Hih lai-a a om mi pawlkhatte a sih ma-in Mihing Tapa, Kumpi-in hong pai ding ahih lamtak phawkkhial kei un,” a ci hi.
Tua zawh ni guk ciangin Jesuh in Peter, James le a nau Johan-te samin mual sang khat dawnah a tuamin a paipih hi.
Tua lai mun panin amaute’ muhtangpi mahin Jesuh a mel kikheel a, a maitang ni bangin taangin, a puante khuavak bangin a ngo hi.
Tua lai-ah Moses le Elijah hong omvat uh a, Jesuh tawh a kiho a mu uh hi.

Tua ciangin Peter in Jesuh kiangah, “Topa aw, hih lai-ah i om, nuam mahmah hi. Hoih na sak leh, nang ading buk khat, Moses ading buk khat, Elijah ading buk khat, buk thum ka hong lamsak ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua bangin a pau laitakun meii ngo hong kaai vatin amaute hong khuh a, tua meii lak panin aw khat hong ging vatin, “Hih pa pen ka it, ka lung a kim mahmahna ka Tapa ahi hi. Ama thu na ngai un,” a hong ci hi.
Nungzuite in hih awging a zak uh ciangin leilakah boksuk uh a, lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.
Ahi zongin Jesuh hong pai-in amaute va lawng a, “Tho un, lau kei un,” a va ci hi.
Amaute a khuadak uh ciangin Jesuh sim loh kuamah dang a mu nawn kei uh hi.
Mual tung panin amaute a ciahsuk laitakun Jesuh in nungzuite kiangah, “Sihna panin Mihing Tapa a kithawhkiksak matengin hih na muhte uh kuama kiangah gen kei un,” ci-in thu a pia hi.
Tua ciangin nungzuite in Jesuh kiangah, “Bang hangin Thukham hilh siate in, Elijah hong pai masa ding hi, ci uh ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Jesuh in, “Na khempeuh a bawl khol dingin Elijah hong pai masa takpi hi.

Ahi zongin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Elijah hong pai khin napi-in mite in amah thei lo uh ahih manin a ututun a bawl uh hi. Tua mah bangin Mihing Tapa in zong bawlsiatna thuak ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin Tuiphumpa Johan’ thu a gen ahih lamtak nungzuite in a thei uh hi.
Mihonte omna a tunkik uh ciangin Jesuh kiangah mi khat hong pai-in ama mai-ah hong khukdin a,
“Topa aw, nong hehpihna-in ka tapa hong damsak in. Amah in sihbup natna nei-in gim mahmah hi. Meikhuk sungah ahi a, tui sungah ahi zongin a puk zel hi.
Na nungzuite kiangah ka paipih hangin amaute in damsak thei lo uh hi,” a ci hi.
Jesuh in, “Upna nei lo, a ngaihsun khial mite aw, note bang tanvei hong ompih dinga, bang tanvei hong kikholhpih ding ka hi hiam? A naupang hong paipih un,” a ci hi.
Jesuh in tua naupang’ sung panin dawi a pai khiat nadingin thu pia a, a naupang thakhatin a dampah hi.
Tua ciangin amau guak a om laitakun nungzuite in Jesuh kiangah, “Bang hangin kote in tua dawi hawl khia thei lo ka hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dot uh ciangin

Jesuh in, “Na upna uh a cingtaak lohna hang ahi hi. Ahi taktakin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Ankam tang cia bang upna na neih nak-uhleh, hih mual kiangah, ‘Hih lai panin hua lai-ah kin in,’ ci le-uhcin kin khia ding hi. Na hih theih loh uh khat zong om lo ding hi.
Thungetna le antanna tawh lobuang, thudang tawh hih bangte kihawl khia thei lo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Galilee gam sungah a om laitakin Jesuh in a nungzuite kiangah, “Mihingte khut sungah Mihing Tapa kipia dinga,
mite in a that ding uh hi. Ahi zongin a ni thum ni-in kihing kiksak ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua thu a zak uh ciangin nungzuite a dah mahmah uh hi.
Kapernaum khua-ah a tun uh ciangin biakinn siahdongte in Peter kiangah, “Na siapa in biakinn siah hamu a piak ngei mah ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot uh ciangin,
