“A piak ngei mah ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. Innsungah Peter a lut ciangin Jesuh in na paupih masa zaw a, “Simon aw, nang na bangci ngaihsut hiam? Leitung kumpite in kuate tung panin siah kai ahi uh hiam? Amau tate tung panin siah kai ahi uh hiam, tua ahih kei leh midangte tung panin kai ahi uh hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin
Peter in, “Midangte tung panin siah a kai uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Tua ahihleh siah piak ding panin a tate a peng ahi hi.

Ahi zongin amau’ nasepna a nawngkaisak i suahkhak loh nadingin tuili-ah nga siahna sikkawi va khia inla, a awk masa penpen hong kai khia in. Tua a ngasa kam sung en lecin dangka tang peek khat na om ding hi. Tua sum la inla, ei tegel adingin biakinn siah va pia in,” a ci hi.
Tua laitakin Jesuh kiangah nungzuite hong pai uh a, “Vantung ki-ukna sungah kua lian pen ding ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot uh ciangin,
Jesuh in naupang khat samin amaute mai-ah dingsak a,
“A man mahmahin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Note kikheelin naupang na bat kei uhleh vantung ki-ukna sungah na lut ngei kei ding uh hi.
Hih naupang bangin a kiniamkhiat mite, vantung ki-ukna sungah a lianpen hi ding hi.
Keima min hangin hih bang naupang khat a limbawl mi in kei zong hong limbawl ahi hi.
“Ahi zongin kei a hong um hih naupangnote khatpeuh a khialsak mi pen a ngawngah an gawina suang lianpi khat kikhihin tuipi thuk sungah kikhiasuk le ama adingin hoih zaw thampek ding hi.

“Tua bangin mi a khialsak thei ding om ahih manin leitung mite adingin a dahhuai mahmah thu ahi hi. Tua bang pen a piang tawntung ding hi a, ahi zongin tua bangin khialhna a piangsak mite adingin dahhuai pha mahmah diak hi.

“Na khut ahi a, na khe in ahi zongin hong khialhsak leh sattan inla pai khia in. Meikuang tawntung sungah khut kim khe kimin hong kikhiat sangin nuntakna sungah khut sam khe samin lut lecin nang adingin hoih zaw ding hi.
Na mit in hong khialhsak leh khel khia inla pai khia in. Mit kim nei-in hell khuk sungah hong kikhul sangin mit langkhat bek tawh nuntakna sungah lut lecin nang adingin hoih zaw ding hi.
“Hih naupangnote khatpeuh na simmawhkhak loh nadingun kidawm un. Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Amaute a kem vantung mite pen vantungah ka Pa kiangah om tawntung uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Mihing Tapa pen a mangthang mite a hon dingin a hong pai ahi hi.

Note in bangci ngaihsut na hi uh hiam? Mi khat in tuu zakhat nei henla, a tuute khat mang leh, mualtungah a gamta adang sawmkua le kuate nusia-in tua a mang pen a zong dingin kuan khia ding hi lo ahi hiam?
Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Tua a mang tuu a muh ciangin a mang lo tuu sawmkua le kuate tungah a lungdamna sangin a mang pen tungah a lungdamna lian zaw hi lo ahi hiam?
Tua mah bangin vantungah a om na Pa un hih naupangnote khat zong a sih ding a deih kei hi.
“Na sanggamte uh na tung uhah hong khialh leh pai-in no tegel bek theihin a khialhna va gen un. Na thu uh a hong man leh na sanggampa uh a ngahkik na hi uh hi.

Ahi zongin na thu uh a hong mannop kei leh, Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘Mi nih ahih kei leh mi thum’ theihna bek tawh mawhsakna khat peuhpeuh man pan hi,’ a cih mah bangin midang khat ahi a, nih ahi zongin tonpih un.
Amah in tua mite’ thu a mannop kei leh pawlpite tungah a thu ko un. Pawlpite’ thu nangawn a mannop kei leh Gentail mite le siahdongte bangin na ngaihsun un.
“Note kiangah a taktakin kong genin-ah: Leitungah na kham peuhmah uh vantungah zong kikham dinga, leitungah na phal peuhmah uh vantungah zong kiphal ding hi.
Leitungah note nih thukimin na nget uh na khat peuhpeuh, vantungah a om ka Pa in hong pia ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh keima minin mi nih le thum bek nangawn a kikhopna peuhpeuhah kei ka om hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Peter in Jesuh va naih a, “Topa aw, ka sanggamte khatpeuh ka tungah hong khialh ciangin bangzah vei maisak ding ka hi hiam? Sagih vei dongtak maisak ding ka hi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin
Jesuh in, “Sagih vei ciangbek maisak in kong ci kei hi. Sawm sagih mun sagih vei maisak in kong ci hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh vantung ki-ukna zia pen a nasemte in sum bangzah a ba hiam, ci-in a sazian a en kumpipa’ hihna zia tawh kibang hi.
Kumpipa in a sum ba sazian a et a kipat ciangin ama sum mak tampi a ba nasem khat hong kipaipih hi.
Tua nasem pa in a sum loh zo lo ahih manin amah a kipan a zi a tate le a neih khempeuh zuakin a leiba a loh nadingin kumpipa in thu a pia hi.
Tua ahih manin a nasem pa zong a mai-ah hong bokin thum a, ‘Topa aw, hong ngak lai in; a vekpi-in ka hong loh ding hi,’ ci-in a thum hi.
Kumpipa in khasiathuai sa ahih manin a leiba teng maisakin a khah hi.
“Ahi zongin tua nasem pa a pai khiat ciangin ama sum ngun peek zakhat khawng a ba a naseppih dang khat tawh a kituak hi. Tua pa a gawlin manin, ‘Na leiba hong loh in,’ a ci hi.
A naseppih pa zong a mai-ah bokin hong thum a, ‘Hong ngak lai in; ka hong loh ding hi,’ a ci hi.
Ahi zongin ama thumna sang nuam lo hi. A leiba a loh khit matengin thongah a kia dingin a khumsak hi.
A naseppih dangte in hih thupiang a theih uh ciangin dahhuaisa mahmah uh ahih manin, a thupiang khempeuh kumpipa kiangah a ko uh hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in tua nasem pa sam a, ‘A gilo nasem pa aw, kei kiangah hong thum na hih manin na leiba khempeuh ka hong maisak hi.
Nang ka hong hehpih mah bangin na naseppih pa zong na hehpih ding kilawm hi lo ahi hiam?’ a ci hi.
Kumpipa zong a heh suak ahih manin a leiba khempeuh a loh khit matengin thong sungah a kikhum nadingin thu a pia hi.
“Tua mah bangin note in zong na lungsim uhah na sanggamte uh mawhna na maisaknop kei uhleh vantungah a om ka Pa in note tungah zong tua bangmahin a hong bawl ding ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Jesuh in a thugen a man khit ciangin Galilee gam panin pai khia-in Judea gam Jordan gun galkhat ah a pai hi.
Mihon tampi in amah zui uh a, tua munah cinate a damsak hi.
Farisi mite pawlkhat Jesuh kiangah hong pai uh a, amah a mawhsak theih nading uh a deihna-un, “Thu khat peuhpeuh hangin zi mak theih ding mah ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Jesuh in, “Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘A kipat cil-in a Piangsak pa in numei le pasal a bawl hi,’ ci hi.
Tua ciangin, ‘Hih thu hangin pasal in a nu le a pa nusia-in a zi tawh kigawm dinga, amau tegel pumkhat a bang ding uh hi,’ ci-in na kigelh hi.
Tua ahih manin amaute nih hi nawn loin khat ahi ta uh hi. Tua ahih manin Pasian in a gawmsa mite, kuamah in khen kei tahen,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin Farisi mite in, “Tua ahihleh bang hangin Moses in mi khatpeuh makna lai gelh sakin a zi masak thei ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot uh ciangin
Jesuh in, “Note, hilhzawhin na om loh manun Moses in hih bangin ngeina a omsak thei ahi hi. Ahi zongin a kipat cil-in tua bang na hi lo hi.
Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Mi khatpeuh in midang tawh a zi a mawhna lobuang, a zi a mak a, numei dang tawh a ten leh numei tunga mawh ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin a nungzuite in Jesuh kiangah, “Nupa thu tua bang ding ahihleh kiteeng vet kei lehang hoih zaw ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ahi zongin Jesuh in, “Hih ngeina pen mi khempeuh in a zuihzawh ding hi lo a, Pasian in a tuaci dingin a sehte bek in a zui zo ding uh ahi hi.
Mi pawlkhat a pianpihin gehsa bang om a, pawlkhatte a kigettawm om a, pawlkhatte pen vantung ki-ukna hangin geh bangin a om hi. Geh bangin a om zote om tahen,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin mi pawlkhat in a naupangte uh tungah Jesuh in a khut nga-in thu a ngetsak nading deihin a naupangte uh a hong paipih uh hi. Ahi zongin a nungzuite in tua mite na taii uh hi.
Jesuh in, “Vantung ki-ukna pen naupangte tawh a kibang mite ading ahih manin, tua naupangte ka kiangah hong paipihsak unla, khaktan kei un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jesuh in naupangnote tungah a khut nga-in thupha a piak khit ciangin a pai khia hi.
Khatvei, Jesuh kiangah mi khat hong pai a, “Sia aw, nuntak tawntungna ka ngah nadingin bang gamtat hoih gamta ding ka hi hiam?” ci-in a hong dong hi.
Jesuh in, “Bang hangin bang hoih hiam cih thu hong dong na hi hiam? A hoih khat bek om hi. Nuntak tawntungna sungah na lut nop leh thukhamte na zui in,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Amah in, “Bang thukhamte ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin Jesuh in, “Mi that kei in; numei tungah mawh kei in; mi neihsa gu kei in; zuauthu gen kei in;
na nu na pa zahtak in; nang na ki-it bangin na veengte na it in, cihnate ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin tangvalpa in, “Hihte khempeuh ka zuihsa ahi hi; bang kisam lai ding ka hi hiam?” a cih ciangin
Jesuh in, “Mi cingtaak na hihnop leh pai-in na neihsate va zuak inla, na sum khotte, mizawngte tungah va pia lecin, vantungah sum na hau ding hi. Tua ciangin hong pai inla kei hong zui in,” a ci hi.
Tangvalpa in hih thu a zak ciangin, amah hau mahmah ahih manin, mai khingin a pai khia hi.
Tua ciangin Jesuh in a nungzuite kiangah, “A mantak a kong genin-ah: Mihau khat pen vantung ki-ukna sungah a lut ding haksa mahmah ding hi.
Adang khat hong gen leuleu ning: Pasian ukna sungah mihau khat a lut ding sangin phim bilvang sungah kalaoh khat a lut ding baih zaw lai hi,” a ci hi.
Nungzuite in hih thu a zak uh ciangin lamdangsa mahmah uh a, “Kua in hotkhiatna ngah zo ding ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Ahi zongin Jesuh in amaute enin, “Mihingte’ hihzawh ding hi lo mah hi; ahi zongin Pasian in na khempeuh hih thei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Peter in, “Kote in na khempeuh nusia-in nang ka hong zui uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin bang ngah ding ka hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin

Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Ke’n limtak a kong genin-ah: A hong tung ding hun thak sungah a minthanna tokhom tungah Mihing Tapa a tut hun ciangin kei a hong zui note zong, tokhom sawm le nihte tung mahah tu-in Israel minam sawm le nihte tungah thukhenin na om ding uh hi.
Keima hangin a inn, a sanggam numei, a sanggam pasal, a nu, a pa, a tate, a leitang, khat peuhpeuh a nusiate in a zah zakhat ngahkikin, nuntak tawntungna zong a ngah ding uh hi.
Ahi zongin tuhun laitakin a lian mi tampite tua hun ciangin a neu suak dinga, tuhun laitakin a neu tampite tua hun ciangin a lian hi ding uh hi.
“Bang hang hiam cih leh vantung ki-ukna sung omzia pen a leenggah lo ah na a sem ding a cial dingin zing tungin a kuan khia leenggah lo nei pa tawh kibang hi.
Ni tha ngeina ngun peek khat piak dingin a kithukim khit uh ciangin a leenggah lo ah na a sem dingin pawlkhat a kuansak hi.
Zingsang nai kua hun ciangin mihon omna sumbukah pai leuleu a, mi pawlkhat bangmah sem loin a mawk om a muh ciangin,
‘No zong leenggah lo ah va kuan un; a kilawm zah khat kong pia ding hi,’ a cih ciangin pawlkhat a kuan uh hi.
Tua ciangin sun sawm le nih ciangin pawlkhat cial leuleu a, nitak nai thum ciangin pawlkhat a cial lai hi.
Nitak nai nga ciangin mihon omna sumbukah a pai leh mi pawlkhat a mawk om mu ahih manin, ‘Bang hangin bangmah sem loin sunthapai mawk om na hi uh hiam?’ ci-in a dot ciangin
amaute in, ‘Kuamah in nasem dingin hong cial lo hi,’ ci-in a dawng uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute kiangah, ‘No zong leenggah lo ah va kuan un,’ a ci hi.
“Nitak ciangin lo nei pa in a nuai-a nasem ukpa kiangah, ‘Lo khote sam inla, a kicial nunung pen a kipanin a kicial masa pente dongin a ni tha uh pia in,’ a ci hi.
Nitak nai nga hunin a kipan nasemte ngun peek khat ciat kipia hi.
A kuan masa pente, ni tha sang dingin hong pai uh ciangin adangte sangin tam ngah zaw ding ci-in amau kilamen napi-in amaute zong ngun peek khat ciat mah kipia veve hi.
A sum a san uh ciangin lo nei pa tungah phun uh a,
‘A nunungte in nai khat sung bek sem napi-in, sunthapai-in nisa thuakin na a sem kote tawh na kikimsak hi,’ a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin lo nei pa in amaute khat kiangah, ‘Lawm aw, nang ka hong khem het kei hi. Ni khat sung nasep thaman dingin ngun peek khat piak dingin na thukimsa hi lo ahi hiam?
Hih na thalawhsa sum la inla ciah in. Nang ka hong piakzah mah, hih a kicial nunungte tungah zong ka pia nuam hi.
Keima sum pen keima ut bangin ka zattheih ding hi lo ahi hiam? Tua ahih kei leh kei ka cit manin na heh suak ahi hiam?’ a ci hi.
Tua ahih manin a neute lian dinga, a liante neu ding hi,” a ci hi.
Jerusalem khua manawhin Jesuh a paitoh laitakin, a paikawmun sawm le nihte tawh tuamtonin thu genpih a,
“Tu-in Jerusalem khua-ah a paito ding ihi hi. Siampi liante le Thukham hilh siate tungah Mihing Tapa kiheek dinga, amaute in a si dingin thu a khen khit uh ciangin
Gentail mite in simmawh bawlin, satin, singlamteh tungah a khai dingin amaute khut sungah a pia ding uh hi. Ahi zongin a ni thum ni-in kihing kiksak ding hi,” ci-in a tuamin thu a hilh hi.
Tua ciangin Zebedi tate James le Johan’ nu, a ta tegel tawh Jesuh kiangah hong pai-in a mai-ah khukdinin hong thum hi.
Jesuh in tua nupi kiangah, “Bang deih na hi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin amah in, “Kumpi-in na om ciangin hih ka tate khat na taklamah, khat na veilamah a tut nadingin thu pia lecin ka ut hi,” a ci hi.
Ahi zongin Jesuh in, “Na nget uh na thei kei uh hi. Ka thuak ding gimna note in thuakzo ding na hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin amaute in, “Ka thuakzo ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Keima thuak mah bangin note in na thuak takpi ding uh a, ahi zongin ka taklam le ka veilama tutding pen kei’ hong piak theih hi lo hi. Ka Pa in a sehsa mite ading bek ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Nungzui dang sawmte in hih thu a zak uh ciangin hih unau nihte tungah a heh uh hi.
Ahi zongin Jesuh in amaute sam a, “Mi a uk Gentail-te in mite tungah aana nei uh a, mi a makai Gentail-te in thuneihna tawh a ukna thu na thei uh hi.
Ahi zongin note lakah tua bang hi lo ding hi. Note lakah a lian ahi dingte note’ nasem hi dinga,
note’ lakah a lian pen ahi dingte note’ sila hi ding hi.
Mihing Tapa zong nasem nei dingin hong pai hi loin mi dangte ading na semin, mi tampi tat nading a si dingin a hong pai ahih mah bangin note zong a tuaci ding na hi uh hi,” a ci hi.
Jerikho khua panin a pai khiat uh ciangin mi tampi in Jesuh a zui uh hi.
Lampi gei-ah a tu mittaw mi nih in tua lampi tawnin Jesuh hong pai hi, ci-in a zak uh ciangin nakpitakin kiko uh a, “David’ suan Topa aw, kote hong hehpih in,” a ci uh hi.
Mihonpite in tua mi tegel a kikoko loh nadingun a taii uh hi. Ahi zongin amaute kiko pha semsem uh a, “David’ suan Topa aw, kote hong hehpih in,” a ci teitei uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jesuh khawlin amaute sam a, “Bang ka hong hihsak ding deih na hi uh hiam?” a cih ciangin
amaute in, “Topa aw, ka mit uh khua hong musakkik in,” a ci uh hi.
Jesuh in amaute hehpihhuai sa ahih manin a mit uh lawnsak a, thakhat thu-in a mit un khua a mukik pah hi. Tua ciangin amau tegel in zong Jesuh nung a zuipah uh hi.
Jerusalem khuanai, Bethfage khua a omna Oliv Mual a tun uh ciangin Jesuh in a nungzuite nih ma sawl a,
“Mai-a a om khua-ah va pai un. Na tun uh ciangin la nuta khau a kikhih na mu ding uh hi. Hong sut unla hong kai un.
Mi khatpeuh in hong paupih leh, ‘Topa in deih hi,’ ci le-uhcin hong paisak pah ding hi,” ci-in a vaikhak hi.
Hih thu pen kamsangpa’ thugenna a tun nadingin a piang ahi hi.
Tua a genna-ah,“En un, na kumpipa uh hong pai hi.Kiniamkhiatna tawh lapi tung le lano tungahtuangin hong pai hi,ci-in Zion khuamite kiangahgen un,” a ci hi.
Nungzui tegel zong Jesuh sawl bangin va pai uh hi.
Amaute in a la nuta hong paipih uh a, a tungah a puante uh a phah khit uh ciangin Jesuh a tuang hi.
Mihon tampite in ama pai nading lampi-ah a puante uh na phah uh a, adangte in nisuh hiangte satin lampi-ah a na phah uh hi.
A mai-a pai mihonte le a nunga zui mihonte awng uh a, “David’ suan Jesuh in phatna ngah tahen! Topa’ min tawh hong pai pa in thupha ngah tahen! A sangpena om Pasian in phatna ngah tahen!” a ci uh hi.
Jerusalem khua sung a tun uh ciangin khua sung mi khempeuh gamlum henhan uh a, “Hih pa kua ahi hiam?” ci-in khatlekhat a kidong uh hi.
Mihonpite in, “Galilee gam Nazareth khua pan a kamsang Jesuh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian biakna innpi huang sungah Jesuh lut a, tua sungah van zuak van lei-a a om mi khempeuh a hawl khia hi. Sumkhek nasemin a om mite’ sabuai le vakhu zuakte’ tutnate a lumletsak gawp hi.
Amaute kiangah, “Pasian in Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘Ka inn pen thungetna inn kici ding hi,’ ci napi-in, note in guktakna phualpi na suaksak uh hi,” a ci hi.
Biakinn sung Jesuh kiangah mittawte le khebaite hong pai uh a, amah in amaute a damsak hi.
Ahi zongin siampi liante le Thukham hilh siate in a nalamdang bawlte mu-in, biakinn sungah naupangte in, “David’ suan Jesuh in phatna ngah tahen!” ci-in a kikona a zak uh ciangin heh uh ahih manin

Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute nusia a, khuapi sung pan pai khia-in Bethany khua-ah a giak hi.
A zingsang ciangin khuapi zuanin hong paikik laitakin Jesuh a gil a kial hi.
Lam gei-ah theikung khat mu ahih manin a gei-ah va pai a, ahi zongin a teh sim loh bangmah a mu kei hi. Jesuh in tua theikung kiangah, “Gah ngei nawn kei in!” a cih khit phetin a theikung a sipah hi.
Nungzuite in a muh uh ciangin lamdangsa uh ahih manin, “Bang hangin theikung tuaci sihpah ahi hiam?” a cih uh ciangin

Jesuh in, “Note kiangah a mantak a kong genin-ah: Note in uplahna nei hetloin, upna taktak na neih nak-uhleh hih theikung tungah a piang bang na hih theih uh banah, hih mual kiang nangawnah, ‘Na omna pan pai khia-in tuipi sung kidenna in,’ ci le-uhcin na cih bangun piang ding hi.
Upna na neih nak-uhleh na nget peuhpeuh uh na ngah ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Biakinn tual sungah Jesuh lutkik a, thuhilhin a om laitakin siampi liante le upate ama kiangah hong pai uh a, “Hih nate kua thu tawh bawl a, na bawl nading kua in aana hong pia ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot uh ciangin
Jesuh in, “Kei zong thu khat kong dong masa ding hi. Na hong dawn nak-uhleh kei zong kua thu tawh bawl cih kong gen ding hi.

Johan in tuiphum theih nading thu koi lai panin ngah ahi hiam? Pasian kiang panin thu ngah ahi hiam, ahih kei leh mihingte kiang panin thu ngah ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute khatlekhat kiseel uh a, “Pasian kiang pan hi,” ci lehang, “Bang hangin um lo na hi uh hiam?” hong ci ding hi.
Ahi zongin, “Mihingte kiang pan hi,” ci leuleu lehang, mi khempeuh in Johan pen kamsang hi, ci-in ngaihsun uh ahih manin mihonte i kihta zel hi, kici uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Jesuh kiangah, “Ka thei kei uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi. Jesuh in zong amaute kiangah, “Kei zong hih nate, kua thu tawh ka bawl cih kong gen kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Note in bangci ngaihsut na hi uh hiam? Mi khat in tapa nih nei hi. A ta u zaw kiangah, ‘Ka ta aw, tuni-in leenggah lo ah va kuan in,’ ci-in a sawl ciangin
amah in, ‘Kuan nuam kei ing,’ ci napi-in a lungsim kikheelin a kuankik hi.
Tua ciangin a ta nau zaw kiangah tua mah bangin va ci a, ‘Pa aw, va kuan mah ning,’ ci napi-in a kuan kei hi.

Hih tapa nihte sung panin a koi bel pen a pa’ deih bangin gamta ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute in, “A ta u zaw a ta hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Note kiangah a mantak a kong genin-ah: Pasian’ ukna sungah note sangin siahdongte le numei paktatte lut masa zaw ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh note kiangah Tuiphumpa Johan hong pai-in thuman lampi hong lak napi-in na um kei uh a, ahi zongin siahdongte le numei paktatte in a um uh hi. Hih thu na theih khit uh ciang nangawnin na lungsim uh na kheel nuam tuan kei uh a, na um kei veve uh hi.

“Thu gentehna dang khat na ngai lai un. Mi khat in lo zuanin leenggui suan a, a kimkot umin, leenggah cil nading bawl a, a honna ding tausang khat a lam khit ciangin lo khawhlawhte khawhlawh-sakin gam dangah a pai hi.
Leenggah min hun a tun ciangin ama ngah ding teng a va la dingin lo khawhlawhte kiangah a nasemte a paisak hi.
Lo khawhlawhte in a nasemte na manin khat na sat gawp uh a, khat na thatin, khat suang tawh na deng gawp uh hi.
Tua ciangin lo nei pa in a masa-a sangin nasem a tam zaw va paisak leuleu a, ahi zongin a masa-a mah bangin a nasemte a na bawlsia veve uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin ka tapa paisak leng na zahtak ding uh hi, ci-in ngaihsun ahih manin a tapa a paisak hi.
Ahi zongin lo khawhlawhte in a tapa a muh uh ciangin, ‘Hih pa pen a gamhluah ding pa ahi hi. Hong pai un; amah thatin a luah ding teng eite in la ni,’ a kici uh hi.
Tua ahih manin amah manin that uh a, lo nawlah a paai uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin leenggah lo nei pa hong pai ciangin a lo khawhlawhte bangci bawl ding ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Amaute in, “Tua migilote that gawp dinga, a hunhunin leenggah a pia ding lo khawhlawh dangte khosak ding hi,” a ci uh hi.

Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Lai Siangtho sungah,‘Innlamte in a nilkhiat suang peninnkiu suang bulpi suak khinta hi.Hih pen Topa’ bawl hi a,i muh ciangin lamdang i sa hi,’ci-in a kigelhna sim ngei lo na hi uh hiam?
Tua ahih ciangin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Note pen Pasian hong ki-uksak nawn lo dinga, a kilawmin a gamta ding mite bek Pasian in uk ding hi.
Hih suang tungah a kia mi khempeuh kizan gawp dinga, mi khatpeuh tungah tua suang a kiat leh zong dengzan gawp ding hi,” a ci hi.
Siampi liante le Farisi mite in hih thugentehna a zak uh ciangin amaute a cihnopna-in a gen ahih lam a phawk uh hi.
Jesuh a man dingin kithawi uh a, ahi zongin mihonte in kamsang khatin ngaihsun uh ahih manin mihonte a kihtak manun a man ngam kei uh hi.
Jesuh in amaute kiangah thugentehna dang khat zangin thu hilh a,
“Vantung ki-ukna zia pen a tapa adingin mopawi a bawl kumpipa’ gamtatzia tawh kibang hi.
Mopawi siim dingin a khohsa mite a sam dingin a nasemte sawl a, ahi zongin kuamah pai lo hi.

Tua ciangin nasem dangte sawl leuleu a, ‘Ka khohsaksa mite kiangah hih bangin va gen un: Ka bawngtalte le ka bawngno thaute kigo khin a, nitak an a minsa-in a om banah, na khempeuh a mansa-in om khinta hi. Mopawi an ne dingin hong pai ta un, ci hi, ci-in va gen un,’ a ci hi.
Ahi zongin a khohsa mite in na thusim lo uh a, pawlkhat in lo na kuansanin, pawlkhat in a sumbukah na paisanin,
adangte in a nasemte manin a na sat gawp khit uh ciangin a na that uh hi.
Kumpipa zong heh mahmah a, a galkapte kuansakin tua mi thatte a thahsak khit ciangin a khua a haltumsak hi.
Tua ciangin a nasemte kiangah, ‘Mopawi an a baihsa-in om a, ahi zongin ka sap mite a ne dingin a kilawm lo mi a suak uh hi.
Tua ahih manin lamlianpi-ah va pai unla, mi na muh zahzah uh hong sam un,’ a ci hi.
Nasemte zong lamlianpi-ah va pai uh a, mihoih mihoih lo ci loin a muh khempeuh uh va kaikhawm uh ahih manin mopawi bawlna inn sung dimin leengla hong om hi.
“Kumpipa, a leenglate a en dingin a hong lut ciangin mopawi siimna puan a silh lo mi khat a mu hi.
Ama kiangah, ‘Lawm aw, mopawi siimna puan silh lopi-in hih lai-ah hong bangci lut theih na hi hiam?’ a cih ciangin tua mipa in a cih nading a thei kei hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in a nasemte kiangah, ‘A khut a khe hen unla, pualam khuamialna lakah lawn khia un; tua lai-ah kapin a hagawi ding hi,’ a ci hi.
“Bang hang hiam cih leh mi tampi a kisap hangin tawm bek a kiteel hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Farisi mite pai khia uh a, a kampauna tawh Jesuh a mat theih nadingun thu a kikum uh hi.

Amau’ nungzuite le Herod mi pawlkhat, Jesuh kiangah a paisak uh hi. Amaute in, “Sia aw, thu ahi bang a gen tawntung na hihna thu ka thei uh hi. Mite kuamah zahtak tuam nei lo na hih manin midangte’ pau ding bangmah phamawhsa loin Pasian in mite’ gamtat ding a deihna bangin tangtakin thu na hilh tawntung hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Rom kumpipa Sisar tungah siah i piak ding kilawm hiam, na ngaihsutna nong gen nadingin ka deih uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ahi zongin Jesuh in amau’ gitloh geelna thei ahih manin, “Mihoih a kineihkhem mite aw, bang hangin kei hong thangsiah se na hi uh hiam?
Siahin na piak ding uh sum hong lak dih un,” a cih ciangin sumtang peek khat hong paipih uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Hih sum tungah kua lim le kua min om ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin
amaute in, “Sisar’ lim le a min kigelh hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Sisar’ nate Sisar’ tungah na pia unla, Pasian’ nate Pasian’ tungah na pia un,” a ci hi.
Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin lamdangsa mahmah uh a, ama kiang panin a pai khia uh hi.
Tua ni mahin, misite thawhkikna om lo hi, ci-in a um Saddusi mite pawlkhat Jesuh kiangah hong pai uh a,
“Sia aw, Moses in, ‘Mi khat ta nei loin a sih leh tua a si mipa’ khang a kizop theih nadingin a naupa in a u’ zi luah tahen,’ ci hi.
Tu-in kote lakah unau pasal sagih om ngei hi. A u pen in zi nei a, ta nei loin si ahih manin ama zi a naupa in a luah hi.
Tua mah bangin a nihna, a thumna a kipan a sagihna dongin ta nei loin a si uh hi.
Tua unau pasal sagihte a sih khit ciangin a numei zong a si hi.
Tua ahih manin tua unau pasal sagihte in tua nu teenpih kim uh ahih manin, thawhkik hun ciangin a koi pen’ zi hi ding ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Ahi zongin Jesuh in, “Note in Lai Siangtho thu ahi a, Pasian’ vangliatna ahi zongin thei lo na hih manun na ngaihsun khial uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh misite a thawhkik uh ciangin vantungah a om vantung mite tawh kibang ding uh a, zinei pasalnei cih om lo ding hi.
Misite thawhkikna thu tawh kisai-in note tungah a gen thute sim ngei lo na hi uh hiam?
Pasian in, ‘Kei pen Abraham’ Pasian, Isaac’ Pasian, Jakob’ Pasian ka hi hi,’ ci hi. Pasian pen a si mite’ Pasian hi loin a nungta mite’ Pasian ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Mihonte in hih thu a zak uh ciangin ama thuhilhna hangin lamdang a sa uh hi.
Ahi zongin Farisi mite in, Saddusi mite’ thudotna Jesuh in dongkhakin, Saddusi mite in a cih nading mel uh a theih nawn lohna thu a zak uh ciangin Jesuh kiangah a hong pai uh hi.
Amaute sung panin Thukham hilh siate khat in Jesuh a thangsiahna-in thu hong dong a,
“Sia aw, thukham khempeuh sung panin bang thukham lian pen ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Jesuh in, “Na Topa Pasian na lungsim khempeuh, na nuntakna khempeuh le na pilna khempeuh tawh na it ding hi, cihna ahi hi.
Hih pen a masa pen, a lian pen thukham ahi hi.
A nihna pen a masa mah tawh kibang a, nangma pumpi na it bangin na veengte na it in, cihna ahi hi.
Hih thukham nihte tung panin thukham dang khempeuh le kamsangte’ thuhilhna khempeuh a hong meeng khia ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua bangin Farisi mite hong kikaihkhop laitakin Jesuh in amaute kiangah,
“Note in Khrih kua hi ci a, kua’ suan hi, ci-in ngaihsun na hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Amaute in, “David’ suan hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Tua ahihleh bang hangin David mahmah in Pasian’ Kha’ sawlna tawh,
‘Topa in keima Topa tungah thu gen a:Na galte, na khe nuai-ahka koih matenginka taklamah na tu in,’ci hi, ci-in thu na gen a, Khrih pen ka Topa ci ahi hiam?
David in Khrih pen Topa ci ahihleh bang hangin Khrih pen David’ suan hi thei ding ahi hiam?” ci-in thu a dong hi.
Kuamah in ama thudotna kamkhat beek dawng thei lo uh hi. Tua hun a kipanin kuamah in Jesuh kiangah thu a dong ngam nawn kei uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jesuh in mihonte le a nungzuite kiangah thu gen a,
“Thukham hilh siate le Farisi mite, Moses’ aana a nei-in thugente ahih manun,
amaute’ gen khempeuh zui-in sem unla, ahi zongin amaute pen a gen bangun gamta lo uh ahih manin amaute’ gamtat bangin gamta kei un.
Amaute in midangte tungah vangik mahmah suanin khihcip uh a, ahi zongin tua van a puakpih dingin a khutmeno khat nangawn uh a taangsak nuam kei uh hi.
Amaute in a sepna khempeuh uh mite’ muh theih dingin a hih se uh hi. Amaute in a talsuan le a banbulhte uh a gol pipi-in bawlin, a puanmongteep uh a sau theithei-in a bawl uh hi.
Pawi sungah a om uh ciangin uliante’ tutna dinga a kibawl munah tu nuam se uh a, kikhopna inn sungah zong uliante tutna tutphah nuam pente tungah a tu nuam diak uh hi.
Mihon lakah mite in hopihin, ‘Sia aw,’ a cih ding uh a ut uh hi.
Ahi zongin note pen, ‘Sia,’ na kicih ding uh hi lo hi. Sia khat bek na nei uh a, no adangte khempeuh unau khat na hi uh hi.
Vantungah Pa khat bek nei na hih manun leitungah kuamah dang, ‘Pa’ na ci kei un.
Topa dingin Khrih bek nei na hih manun note khatlekhat, ‘Topa,’ na kici kei un.
Note lakah a lian penpa, na nasem uh hi ding hi.
A kiliansakte khempeuh in niamkhiatna thuak ding uh a, a kiniamkhiatte khempeuh a lianin kibawl ding hi.

“Mihoih a kineihkhem, no Thukham hilh siate le Farisi mite in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Note in vantung ki-ukna sungah mite a lut theih loh nadingin kong na khakcip uh hi. Note lah na lut nuam kei uh a, a lut nuamte lah na lutsak kei uh hi.

“Mihoih a kineihkhem, no Thukham hilh siate le Farisi mite in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Meigong numeite tungah nuamtak sa-in a neihsa teng uh laksakin na zang mang uh a, mite in mihoih hong saktheih nading na deihna-un thu saupipi na ngen uh hi. Hih bangin na gamtatna uh hangin na gim thuak ding uh nasia zaw kan lai ding hi.

“Mihoih a kineihkhem, no Thukham hilh siate le Farisi mite in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Note in mi khat bek nangawn na ngah zawh nading uh na hanciamna un leitung tuitung lumletin khual na zin uh a, na ngahsunte uh zong note zah nihin a siahuai, hell khuk tung ding mi na suah uh hi.

“Mittaw a bang lamhilhte aw, note in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh note in, ‘Mi khat biakinn tawh a kiciam leh phamawh lo a, ahi zongin biakinn sunga a om kham tawh a kiciam leh a kiciamna in len hi,’ na ci uh hi.
Note pen mihai mittaw lamlak taktak na hi uh hi. Kham thupi zaw ahi hiam, ahih kei leh tua kham a siangtho a suaksak biakinn thupi zaw ahi hiam?
Note in, ‘Mi khat, biakna tau tawh kiciam leh phamawh lo a, ahi zongin biakna tau tungah a kipia letsongte tawh a kiciam leh a kiciamna in len hi,’ na ci uh hi.
Mittaw mite aw, a kipia nate thupi zaw ahi hiam, ahih kei leh tua nate a siangtho a suaksak biakna tau thupi zaw ahi hiam?
Tua ahih manin biakna tau tawh a kiciam mite pen a tunga a om nate khempeuh tawh zong a kiciam ahi hi.
Biakinn tawh a kiciam mite pen a sungah a teengpa tawh zong a kiciam ahi hi.
Vantung tawh a kiciam mite zong Pasian’ kumpi tokhom tawh a kiciam hi a, tua tokhom tungah a tupa tawh zong a kiciam ahi hi.

“Mihoih a kineihkhem, no Thukham hilh siate le Farisi mite in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Note in Pasian tungah lengmasel, masala le kummin sing namtui a kipanin meh namtui nam khempeuh, sawm-ah-khat pia napi-in, thukham sungah a thupi zaw ahi thutang, hehpihna le thumante na don kei uh hi. Adangte nusia tuan loin hih thute na zuih ding uh ahi hi.

A makai ding hinapi-in, mittaw bangin bangmah tum loteng thupi ngaihsutin, a thupi teng na nusiakha uh a, tui tawh na dawnkhop khak loh nadingun thovai khaih napi-in kalaoh a nawmvalhkha tawh na kibang uh hi.

“Mihoih a kineihkhem, no Thukham hilh siate le Farisi mite in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Note in hai le kuangte a pualam na siangsak uh a, ahi zongin tuate sungah, thatanghat thu le huaihamna tawh mi-a’ na suh uh nate a om hi.
A mittaw Farisi mite aw, a pualam zong a siangtho a suah theih nadingin hai le kuang sunga a om nate a siangtho hisak phot un.

“Mihoih a kineihkhem, no Thukham hilh siate le Farisi mite in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Note pen leikang tawh a kizut manin a pualam a hoih mahmah tawh kibang napi-in a sungah misi guh le a kihhuai nin nam khempeuh a omna hankhuk tawh na kibang uh hi.
Tua mah bangin note zong mite’ muhin mihoih mahmah bang napi-in na sung tawng taktak uhah mawhna le kineihkhemna bek a om hi.

“Mihoih a kineihkhem, no Thukham hilh siate le Farisi mite in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Note in a sisa kamsangte’ han, a hoih mahmahin bawlin, a nuntakna uh a hoih, a sisate’ mualsuangte hoihtakin na zem uh a,
‘I pu i pate’ khan lai-in eite a om hi lehang, kamsangte a thah bangun eite in i that kei ding hi,’ na ci uh hi.
Note pen kamsangte a that mite’ suanlekhakte mah na hih manun na zuaupi uh a gen na hi uh hi.
Tua ahih manin i pu i pate’ maban zomto vet un.
Gul a bang mite’ suanlekhak mite aw, hell khuk tun nading thukhenna panin a suakta dingin bangci-in kilamen thei na hi uh hiam?

Note kiangah kamsangte, mipilte le siate ka hong paisak ding hi. Note in pawlkhatte thatin, pawl khatte singlamteh tungah khai-in, pawlkhatte na kikhopna uh inn sungah na sat ding uh a, khua khat pan khua khatah a banbanin na bawlsia ding uh hi.

Tua thu hangin, mawh nei lo Abel a kithah hun a kipanin biakinn le biakna tau kikal-a na thah uh, Barakhiah’ tapa Zekhariah hun ciang dongin, mawhna nei lo a kithat mite khempeuh hangin gimna note in na thuak ding uh hi.
Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Tuhun a mite tungah hih gimna hong tung takpi ding hi.
“Jerusalem, Jerusalem aw, kamsangte na that a, Pasian’ sawl kamtaite na denglum hi. Akpi in a kha tawh a note a huai mah bangin na mite ka huai nuam tawntung a, ahi zongin na ut kei hi.
Tu-in na innte kisusiacip ding hi.
Nang kiangah kong genin-ah: ‘Topa’ min tawh a hong pai mipa in thupha ngah tahen,’ na cih hun hong tun matengin kei nong mu nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Biakinn panin Jesuh a pai khiat laitakin ama kiangah a nungzuite hong pai-in, tua biakinn a thupina zia a lak uh hi.

Ahi zongin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Hihte khempeuh na mu khinta uh hi. Ke’n a mantak a kong genin-ah: Hih inn lamna-a a kiciang suangte a kithuapin a om nangawn a om nawn lo zah dongin kilawnkeek mang ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

Oliv Mual tungah Jesuh tu-in a om laitakin a nungzuite guak a tuamin hong pai uh a, “Hih thute cik ciangin hong piang dinga, nang na hong pai ding hun le hun bei nading bang lim hong om ding ahi hiam, hong gen in,” a ci uh hi.
Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Kidawm unla, mite’ khemsa-in ta kei un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh keimah a kineih mi tampi hong pai dinga, ‘Kei, Khrih ka hi hi,’ ci-in mi tampi tak um khialsak ding uh hi.
A nai, a gamla-ah galkidona thu na za ding uh hi. Hihte a piang mah ding hi a, ahi zongin a bei nading hi nai lo ahih manin patau kei un.
Gam khat le gam khat, kumpi khat le kumpi khat hong kido dinga, mun tuamtuamah kialpi hong tungin, zin hong liing ding hi.
Hihte khempeuh pen gimna kipat nading hi pan hi.
“Tua ciangin note hong kibawlsia-in hong kithat dinga, keima hangin Gentail mi khempeuh in note hong mudah ding uh hi.
Tua hun ciangin mi tampi in a upna uh khahsuah dinga, khatlekhat kimudahin khatlekhat kilehhek ding uh hi.
Kamsang kineihkhem mi tampi hong piang dinga, mi tampi tak um khialsak ding uh hi.
Gitlohna khang mahmah ding ahih manin ki-itna hong kiam ding hi.
Ahi zongin a bei dongin a thuak zote in hotkhiatna ngah ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin mi khempeuh tungah teci ahi dingin Pasian’ hong ukna hangin a lungdamhuai thu, leitung khempeuh ah kihilh ding hi. Tua khit ciangin beina hong tung ding hi.
“Tua ciangin kamsang Daniel in, ‘A lipkhaphuai zehphitna,’ ci-in a gen pen a siangtho munah hong om ciangin (hih lai a simte in Jesuh’ cihnopna thei ta un),
Judea gam a om mite, mualtungah tai henla,
inn tungah a om mite zong, inn sungah van a la dingin lut nawn kei uh hen.
Lo ah a omte zong puan la dingin inn-ah ciah nawn kei hen.
Tua hun laitakin naupaiite le naungek neite adingin haksa mahmah ding hi.
Tua galtai hun pen phalbi laitak le Sabbath ni ahih khak loh nadingin thu na ngen un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh leitung piancil a kipan tuhun dong, cikmahin tua bang haksatna a om ngei lo, nidang ciangin zong a om ngei nawn lo ding, tua hun laitakin hong tung ding hi.
Pasian in tua gimna hun a ni khiam lo hileh a suakta zo kuamah om lo ding hi. Ahi zongin ama teel mite a khualna-in a ni a khiam ding hi.
“Tua laitakin mi khatpeuh in, ‘Hih lai-ah Khrih om hi, hua lai-ah Khrih om hi,’ ci-in hong gen leh, um kei un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Khrih a kineihkhemte le kamsang a kineihkhemte hong piang dinga, ahih zawh leh a teelsa mite nangawn a khem nadingun lim le nalamdang lianpipi hong bawl ding uh hi.
A hun ma-in hong gen kholkhin ka hih manin limtakin kidawm un.
“Tua ahih kei leh zong mite in, ‘Gamlakah Khrih om hi,’ hong cih leh zong va paikha kei un. ‘Innsungah Khrih bu hi,’ hong cih leh zong umkha kei un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Mihing Tapa hong pai ciangin khuaphialep in van mong khat panin mong khat dong a taanzaihsak mah bangin kitheikim ding hi.
“Sapul omna peuhah musane kikaikhawm ding hi.”
“Tua gimna hun a tun khit phetin ni hong mialin kha hong taang nawn lo dinga, vantung panin aksite hong kia dinga, vantung a om nate a pai ngei-in pai thei loin lampial gawp ding hi.
Tua ciangin Mihing Tapa’ lim vantungah hong kilang ding hi. Tua ciangin leitung minam khempeuh dahin kap ding uh a, vangliatna le minthanna tawh meii lakah Mihing Tapa a hong pai a mu ding uh hi.
Nakpi takin peengkul hong ging dinga, leitung mun khempeuh ah a vantung mite hong paisakin, leimong khat pan mong khat dongin, a teelsa mite a kaikhawmsak ding hi.
Theikung tung panin thu phawk un. Thei a hiang hong meengin a teh hong no ciangin khuakhal hun hong naita hi, ci-in na thei uh hi.
Tua mah bangin hih ka thugente khempeuh na muh uh ciangin Mihing Tapa hong tun ding hun hong nai mahmah ta hi, ci-in na thei un.
A mantak a kong genin-ah: Hih lai-a a om mite a sih khit ma-in hih ka thugen khempeuh hong tung ding hi.
Van le lei a mai mang zongin ka thugente mai mang ngei lo ding hi.
Ahi zongin a ni le a nai hun ding pen kuamah in thei lo hi. Vantungah a om vantung mite ahi a, Tapa nangawn in ahi zongin thei lo a, Pa Pasian bek in thei hi.
Noah hun lai-in up hun lohpi khatin tuiciin a tun bangin Mihing Tapa zong up hun lohpi khatin hong pai ding hi.
Tuiciin a tun ma hunin, teembaw sungah Noah a tum ni hun ciang dong, mite in anne zune-in om uh a, mo kipi, mo kikha-in nuntak ngeina bangin om uh hi.
Tuiciin hong tungin tui in mi khempeuh a tupcip hun ciang dong, kuamah in bangmah a theih loh mah bangin Mihing Tapa hong pai ciangin zong kuamah in thei khol lo ding uh hi.
Tua hun laitakin lo a kuankhawm mi nih, khat kila-in khat kinusia ding hi.
An a sukhawm numei nih, khat kila-in khat kinusia ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin bang hunin na Topa uh hong pai ding cih thei lo na hih manun na pilvang un.
Ahi zongin na phawk ding uh thu in: Inn nei pa in zan laitakin guta pa a pai ding hun thei khol leh amah in na pangin a inn luhsak lo ding hi.
Tua ahih manin Mihing Tapa zong, note’ upmawh loh hun laitakin hong pai ding ahih manin note zong na kiging tawntung ta un.
“A pil a citak nasem i cih a bangcite ahi hiam? A naseppih dangte ukin a hun manmanin amaute’ nekzah ding ciat an a pia dingin a topa in a seh a nasem pa ahi hi.
A topa hong ciah ciangin ama sawl bangin na semin a om a muhpa pen mi hampha mahmah khat ahi hi.
Ke’n kong genin-ah, ama neihsa khempeuh a uk dingin a topa in tua nasem pa a koih ding hi.
Ahi zongin tua nasem pa nasem hoih lo hi henla, a lungsim sungah, ‘Ka topa hong ciahhak ding hi,’ ci-in,
a naseppih a lawmte sat gawp henla, zukham thei mite tawh anne zune-in na om leh,
a topa tung dingin a up loh ni hun khatpeuhin a topa hong tung dinga,
a topa in nakpitakin gim pia-in, mihoih a kineihkhemte’ gimthuak ding teng thuaksak dinga, amah kapin a hagawi ding hi.
“Tua hun ciangin vantung ki-ukna zia pen zinei thak pa a uap dingin a meivak uh tawh a pai nungak sawmte tawh kibang ding hi.
Nungak sawmte sung panin nga pil uh a, nga hai uh hi.
Tua a haite in a meivak sung uhah a tui thunthuah lopi-in pai uh a,
ahi zongin a pil nungak ngate in a dimtakin thunin a pai uh hi.
Zineipa hong tunghak ahih manin a vekpi-un lusu-in a ihmu uh hi.
Ahi zongin zankim tak ciangin, ‘Zineipa hong tungta ding hi. Va dawn un,’ ci-in hong kiko hi.
Tua nungakte zong tho-in a meivak uh hong puah ciat uh hi.
Tua ciangin a haite in a pilte kiangah, ‘Ka mei uh mitta ahih manin na meitui uh hong hawm un,’ a cih ciangin
a pilte in, ‘Hong hawm le ung ko ading tawh kicing nawn lo ding ahih manin no ading va leitawm zaw un,’ ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Meitui lei dingin amaute a pai khiat kal sungin zineipa hong tung hi. A kigingsa-in a om nungakte in zineipa dawnin mopawi bawlna sungah a lutkhawm pah uh hi. Tua khit ciangin kong kikhak hi.
Tua khit ciangin nungak haite zong hong tung uh a, ‘Topa, Topa aw, kong hong hon in,’ a cih uh ciangin
amah in, ‘Note ka hong thei het kei hi,’ na cihsan hi.”
“Tua ahih manin a ni le a hun thei lo na hih manun na pilvang un.”
“Inn panin khualzin dingin a pai khia mipa tawh zong kibang hi. Amah in a nasemte samin, a neihsa teng a nasemte’ kep dingin a ap hi.
Amau’ siamna tawh kizui-in khat tungah tulnga, khat tungah tulnih, khat tungah tulkhat a ap khit ciangin a zin khia hi.
Tul nga a ngah pa in sum bawlna-in zangpah a, a meet tulnga mah a ngahthuah hi.
Tul nih a ngah pa in zong a meet tulnih mah a ngahthuah hi.
Ahi zongin tulkhat a ngah pa in leisung to-in a topa’ sum a seelcip hi.
“Hun sawtpi khit ciangin tua nasemte’ topa hong ciahkik a, a nasemte tawh a sum thu a siangsak uh hi.
Tul nga a ngah pa in adang tulnga mah hong tawithuahin, ‘Topa aw, kei tungah tulnga nong ap hi. Hih lai-ah tulnga mah ka meetsak hi,’ hong cih ciangin
a topa in, ‘Hoih mahmah hi; a hoih a citak nasem pa aw, a tawmno na zekna-ah siam na hih manin a tampi tak ka hong zeksak ding hi. Hong pai in; kei tawh nuamsa khawm ni,’ a ci hi.
Tua ciangin tulnih a ngah pa zong hong pai-in, ‘Topa aw, kei tungah tulnih nong ap hi. Hih lai-ah tulnih mah ka na meetsak hi,’ hong cih ciangin
a topa in, ‘Hoih mahmah hi; a hoih a citak nasem pa aw, a tawmno na zekna-ah siam na hih manin a tampi tak ka hong zeksak ding hi. Hong pai in; kei tawh nuamsa khawm ni,’ a ci hi.
Tul khat a ngah pa zong hong pai-in, ‘Topa aw, nang pen na sep loh na bawl lohnapi-ah na a deih, mi genhak mahmah na hihna ka hong thei hi.
Tua ahih manin ka hong kihta a, lei sungah na sum tulkhat ka seel hi. Tu-in hih lai-ah na sumzah mah om hi,’ a hong cih ciangin
a topa in, ‘A hoih lo, a thadah nasem pa aw, ka sep loh ka bawl lohnapi-ah ka deihlam hong thei na hih leh,
sumkholna-ah ka sum na koihsak lecin hoih ding hi. Tua hileh tu-a ka hong tunkik ciangin a bulpi le a meet ka ngahkhawm ding hi.
Tua ahih manin ama tung panin a tulkhat laksak unla, tul sawm a nei pa tungah piathuah un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh a neisate kipiathuah dinga, hau semsem ding hi. Ahi zongin a nei lote tung panin a neihsa sunsun nangawn kilaksak ding hi.
Bangmahin a kimang lo hih nasem pa ahihleh pualam khuamialna lakah lawn khia un. Tua lai-ah kapin a hagawi ding hi,’ ci hi.
“Mihing Tapa a vantung mite tawh Kumpi-in hong paikhawm uh ciangin a kumpi tokhom tungah hong tu ding hi.
Ama mai-ah leitung minam khempeuh hong kikhawm ding hi. Gancing pa in tuu le keelte a khen mah bangin mi khempeuh khen nihin hong koih ding hi.
Tuu a bang mite a taklamah koihin, keel a bang mite a veilamah koih ding hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpipa in a taklamah a om mite kiangah, ‘Ka Pa in thupha a piak mite aw, hong pai ta un. Leitung piancil a kipanin note adingin a kibawl kholsa gamnuam hong luah un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh ka gilkial laitakin an nong pia uh a, ka dangtak laitakin tui nong pia uh a, khualmi ka hih laitakin zin nong do uh a,
puan nei loin ka om laitakin puan nong guan uh a, ka cinat laitakin nong veh uh a, ka thongkiat laitakin nong hawh uh hi,’ a ci ding hi.
Tua ciangin mihoihte in, ‘Topa aw, cikin na gilkial hong mu-in an hong pia a, cikin na dangtak hong mu-in tui hong pia ka hi uh hiam?
Cikin khualmi na hih laitakin hong mu-in zin hong do a, cikin puan nei lo na hih laitakin hong mu-in puan hong guan ka hi uh hiam?
Cikin cina na hih laitakin hong mu-in hong veh a, cikin thongkia na hih laitakin hong mu-in hong hawh ka hi uh hiam?’ a ci ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpipa in amaute kiangah, ‘Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Hih ka sanggamte a neu pen khat nangawn na limbawl uh ciangin kei tungah a hong bawl na hi uh hi,’ ci-in a dawng ding hi.
“Tua ciangin a veilamah a om mite kiangah, ‘Pasian in a samsiat mite aw, keima kiang panin pai khia unla, Dawimangpa le a nungzuite adingin a kibawl meikuang tawntung sungah pai un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh ka gilkial laitakin an nong pia kei uh a, ka dangtak laitakin tui nong pia kei uh a,
khualmi ka hih laitakin zin nong do kei uh a, puan ka neih loh laitakin puan nong guan kei uh a, ka cinat laitakin nong veh kei uh a, ka thongkiat laitakin nong hawh kei uh hi,’ a ci ding hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in zong, ‘Topa aw, cikin na gilkial hong mu a, cikin na dangtak hong mu a, cikin khualmi na hih hong mu a, cikin na puan neih loh hong mu a, cikin na cinat hong mu a, cikin na thongkiat hong mu a, cikin kote in nang hong huh nuam lo ka hi uh hiam?’ a ci ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, ‘Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Hih mite a neu pen khat nangawn na huh loh uh ciangin kei a hong huh lo na hi uh hi,’ ci-in a dawng ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tawntung gimthuakna sungah amaute pai ding uh a, mihoihte ahihleh nuntak tawntungna sungah lut ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Jesuh in hih thute a hilh khit ciangin a nungzuite kiangah,
“Na theihsa uh mah bangin tuzawh ni nih khit ciangin Paisan Pawi hun hong tungta ding hi. Tua ciangin singlamteh tungah thah dingin Mihing Tapa kipia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin siampi lianpen Kaiafas inn-ah siampi liante le upate kikhawm uh a,
kuama theih lohin Jesuh simmatin a thah theih nading uh a vaihawm uh hi.
Amaute in, “Buaina lianpi hong omkha thei ding ahih manin hih pawi hun sungin hih kei ni,” a ci uh hi.
Bethany khua-a miphak ahi ngei Simon inn-ah Jesuh a om laitakin,
numei khat in a manpha mahmah sathau namtui suangngo thawl a dim khat hong tawi-in Jesuh kiangah hong pai a, Jesuh an ne-in a tut laitakin a lu tungah a buaksuk hi.
Ahi zongin nungzuite in a muh uh ciangin heh uh a, “Bang hangin hih sathau namtui mawk beisak ahi hiam?
Hih sathau kizuak leh sum tampi tak kikhawng dinga, mizawngte huhna-in kipia thei ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ahi zongin Jesuh in hih thu phawk ahih manin amaute kiangah, “Hih numei bang nuammawh na hi uh hiam? Kei tungah a kilawm mahmahin amah hong gamta hi.
Mizawngte pen note tawh hong omkhawm tawntung dinga, ahi zongin note tawh kei ka hong omkhawm tawntung kei ding hi.
Keima tungah hih bangin sathau hong buak ciangin ka luanghawm kivui nadingin a hong bawlbawl ahi hi.
Note kiangah a mantak a kong genin-ah: Keima hangin a piang ding lungdamna thu a kigenna leitung khempeuh ah hih numei kiphawkin a gamtatnate kigengen ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin sawm le nihte sung panin Iskariot’ tapa Judas a kici mipa siampi liante kiangah va pai a,
“Note’ khut sungah amah hong pia leng, note in kei bang tawh hong guai ding na hi uh hiam?” a cih ciangin ngun peek sawmthum a pia uh hi.
Tua hun a kipanin amah a lehhek theih nading hunhoih a zongpah hi.
Silngo Sawh loh Anlum Pawi a kipat ni-in nungzuite in Jesuh kiangah, “Paisan Pawi annek ding koilai takah hong bawlsak le ung deih na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Jesuh in, “Jerusalem khua sungah va pai unla, tua mipa kiangah, ‘Siapa in, “Ka hun hong naita hi. Na inn-ah ka nungzuite tawh Paisan Pawi an ka hong ne ding uh hi,” ci hi,’ va ci un,” a ci hi.
Nungzuite zong Jesuh gen bangin gamta uh a, Paisan Pawi an ding a bawl uh hi.
A nitak ciangin Jesuh le sawm le nihte an ne dingin a tukhawm uh hi.
Amaute an ne-in a om laitakun Jesuh in, “Note khat in kei na hong lehhek ding uh hi,” a cih ciangin
amaute dah mahmah uh a, amaute in a banbanin, “Topa aw, kei ka hi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Jesuh in, “Ankuang ka sawk khawmpih pa in kei hong lehhek ding hi.

Mihing Tapa ahihleh Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelhsa mah bangin a si ding ahi hi; ahi zongin Mihing Tapa a lehhek pa in gimna thuak ding hi. Tua mipa pen a piang vet lo hileh ama adingin hoih zaw ding hi,” a ci hi.
Jesuh a lehhek pa Judas in, “Topa aw, kei ka hi hiam?” a cih ciangin, “Na ci khin hi,” ci-in Jesuh in a dawng hi.
Tua bangin an a nek laitakun, Jesuh in anlum la-in lungdamna a koh khit ciangin balnen a, a nungzuite kiangah pia-in, “La unla ne un; hih pen ka pumpi ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin hai la a, lungdamna a koh khit ciangin amaute tungah pia-in, “Na vekpi-un dawn un.
Mi tampite’ mawhna a mai nadingin a luang khia, Pasian’ thuciamna a kipsak, ka sisan ahi hi.
Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Ka Pa’ Ukna sungah note tawh leenggahzu thak ka dawnkik ni matengin leenggahzu ka dawnkik nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin la khat sa uh a, Oliv Mual tungah a pai uh hi.

Tua ciangin Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Lai Siangtho sungah, ‘Tuucingpa ka satlum dinga, a tuute kithehthang ding hi,’ ci-in a kigelh mah bangin note khempeuh in tu nitakin kei na hong taisan mang khin ding uh hi.
Ahi zongin hong kithawh kiksak khit ciangin Galilee gam sung note mai-ah ka pai ding hi,” a ci hi.
Peter in, “Adang khempeuh in hong taisan zongin ke’n kong nusia ngei kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Jesuh in, “Tuzan mahmahin ak a khuan ma-in kei, thumvei tak na hong nial ding lamtak phawk in,” a ci hi.
Ahi zongin Peter in, “Nang tawh sihkhawm nading ciang dong ahi zongin kong nial ngei het kei ding hi,” a ci veve hi. Tua mah bangin nungzui dang khempeuh in zong a ci ciat uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jesuh a nungzuite tawh Gethsemane a kici munah pai-in amaute kiangah, “Hua lamah pai-in thu ka va nget kal sungteng hih lai-ah na om un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Peter le Zebedi tapa tegel tonpih a, dahin a lunggim hun ding a kipan hi.
Amaute kiangah, “Ka lungsim dahna hangin ka si dektak hi. Hih lai-ah na om unla hong ngak un,” a cih khit ciangin
tawmkhat pai lai-in leilakah bokin thu ngen a, “Pa aw, ahi thei ding ahihleh hih thuak nading tawh hong kipelhsak in. Ahi zongin kei’ deihna bang hi loin nangma deihna bang hizaw tahen,” a ci hi.
A nungzui thumte kiangah hong paikik ciangin amaute na ihmu uh hi. Amah in Peter kiangah, “Nai khat sung nangawn hong ngak zo lo liang na hi uh hiam?
Ze-etna-ah na puk khak loh nadingun thu ngen un. Lungsim in ze-etna nang nuam napi-in pumpi in nang zo lo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a nihveina va paikikin thu ngen a, “Pa aw, keima thuak lohin ahi thei lo ding ahihleh nangma deihna bang hi tahen,” a ci hi.
A nungzuite kiangah hong paikik ciangin, a ihmut uh suaklua mahmah ahih manin na ihmu leuleu uh hi.
Tua ahih manin amaute kiang panin pai khiakikin, a kibang mahin a thumveina thu a ngen hi.
Tua ciangin a nungzuite kiangah hong paikik a, “Ihmu-in tawlnga hithiat lailai na hi uh hiam? Mawhnei mite’ khut sungah Mihing Tapa a kipiak ding hun hong tungta hi.
Tho un, pai ta ni. Kei hong lehhek ding pa hong naita hi,” a ci hi.
Tua bangin Jesuh in thu a gen laitakin sawm le nihte sung panin Judas hong tung a, siampi liante le upate in a hong sawl, namsau le molhtum a tawi mihonpi tawh hong tonkhawm hi.
A lehhek pa in mihonte kiangah thu na ma gen a, “Ka nap pen pa amah hi ding hi; man un,” ci-in a lim ding a hilh khol hi.
Judas zong Jesuh kiangah hong paipahin, “Topa aw, thupha ngah ta in,” ci-in hopihin limnap mahmah hi.
Jesuh in, “Lawm aw, hih dingin na ngim pen hihpak in,” ci-in a dawng hi. Tua ciangin mihonte in Jesuh manin a lencip uh hi.
Jesuh tawh a omkhawm mite khat in a namsau dokin siampi lianpen pa’ nasem pa a sat leh, a bil a sat khia hi.
Tua ciangin Jesuh in ama kiangah, “Na namsau a paai-ah siatkik in. Namsau a zangte namsau mah tawh si ding hi.
Ka Pa kiangah ngen hi leng, vantung galkapte hon sawm le hon nih val, thakhat thu-in hong puakpah theih ding lamtak thei lo na hi hiam?
Tua bangin kivaikhak hi zenzen leh Lai Siangtho in tu-a bangin a pian nading a gen pen bangci tun theih ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Jesuh in mihonte kiangah, “Gal le sa bangin hong ngaihsun a, keimah a man dingin namsau le molhtum tawh hong kuan na hi uh hiam? Nisimin biakinn sungah thu ka hilh niloh a, ahi zongin kei nong man kei uh hi.
Ahi zongin Lai Siangtho sungah kamsangte’ thugente a tun theih nadingin hih bangin a hong gamta na hi uh hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin a nungzuite khempeuh in Jesuh nusia-in a taisan uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jesuh a man mite in siampi lianpen pa Kaiafas kiangah hong paipih uh a, tua lai-ah Thukham hilh siate le upate a kikhawm uh hi.
Peter in siampi lianpen pa’ inntual ciang dong Jesuh’ nung galzuih a, bang thu a piang hiam cih a theih nadingin inntualah palikte kiangah a om hi.
Siampi liante le uliante in Jesuh a thah theih nadingun zuau teci a pang ding mi a zong uh hi.
Teci tampi in hong gen hangin thah theih nading zuau teci pang ding kimu lo hi. A tawpna ciangin mi nih in thu hong gen a,
“Hih mipa in, ‘Pasian’ Biakinn susia-in ni thum sungin ka lamkik thei ding hi,’ ci hi,” a hong ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin siampi lianpen pa hong dingin, “Hih hong mawhsakna thu tawh kisai-in na gen ding om lo ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot hangin
Jesuh pau loin a om hi. Tua ciangin siampi lianpen pa in, “Pasian’ Tapa, Khrih na hih leh na hih loh nong gen nadingin a nungta Pasian’ min tawh khauhtakin ka hong sawl hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Nangmah in tua mah na ci khin hi. Ahi zongin note khempeuh kiangah ka hong genin-ah: Vanglianpa’ taklamah Mihing Tapa omin meii tungah a hong pai na mu ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin siampi lianpen pa in a puan balkek a, “Pasian’ tungah a paukhial zo hi. Bang thudang kisam nawn ahi hiam? A paukhialhna na za uh hi.
Note in tu-in bangci ngaihsut na hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin amaute in, “Thah dingin a kilawm hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in a maitang cilphih uh a,
“Nang Khrih aw, kua in hong beeng ahi hiam, hong gen dih in,” a ci uh hi.
Tua bangin inntualah Peter a tut laitakin siampi lianpen pa’ nasem numei khat in ama kiangah, “Nang zong Galilee mi Jesuh tawh a kikhawl na hi hi,” a ci hi.
Ahi zongin Peter in nial a, “Na thugen ka thei kei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin Peter zong inntual pualamah a pai khiat leh numei dang khat mah in mu ahih manin a gei-a omte kiangah, “Nazareth khuami Jesuh tawh hih mipa kikhawl hi,” a ci hi.
Peter in zong nialkik a, “Hua mipa ka theih taak leh,” ci-in a kiciam hi.
Tuazawh a sawt loin a gei-a omte khat in Peter kiangah, “Na kampau zia uh kibang ahih manin nang zong hua mite tawh a kipawl mah na hi takpi hi,” a ci leuleu hi.
Tua ciangin Peter kiciam a, “Hua mipa ka thei kei hi. Zuauthu ka gen taak leh Pasian in kei hong dawm kei tahen!” a ci hi. Tua khit phetin ak hong khuangta hi.
Tua ciangin, “Ak a khuan ma-in kei thumvei na hong nial ding hi,” ci-in Jesuh in a gen thu, Peter in phawkkik ahih manin pai khia-in nakpitakin a kap hi.
A zingsang ciangin siampi liante le upate in Jesuh a thah nading uh a vaihawm uh hi.
